I'm retired and now able to enjoy the opportunity to wear what's comfortable--not what's expected at work.

I bought these to replace my fist pair of Crocs and I still love them. I have several pairs and they are just about all that I wear. I was a bit worried about the fit because I had read several reviews that said they were not as wide as they once were but these were just fine and I do have wide feet. My old Crocs had really worn down and I wear the black ones the most, so I was glad to find these at Amazon. If you want really comfortable shoes and don't care how they look, give Crocs a try, you will probably never look back.

I have a 12 year old pair of Crocs (this same style) that are a bit on the shabby side, but still in wearable shape.  I decided to get a couple new pairs, but the sizing is different than my old pair.  I ordered the same as I'd had before and the new ones are a bit larger.

I have plantar fasciitis, most house shoes don't have sufficient support. These are cushioned enough that my feet don't hurt and big enough that I can wear thick socks to make them comfortable in winter.
My daughter loves her latest pair of classic Crocs and is already decorating with her favourite Jibbitz!
Always love Crocs!!  But granddaughter wanted a pair for Christmas...got three pair of white.  Had to return
I bought a crocs years ago for $5 bucks at the Dollar store.  Believe me they were ready for retirement. Couldn't believe how much they cost now.
Last minute purchase for my daughters bithday. She couldn’t have been happier. Fast shipping, great quality, perfect sizing.
Love them! Comfortable, lightweight and cute!! Love the color!! I usually wear a size 8 but the size 7 fits me in these since I do not ever use the heel wrap!!

My first pair lasted for years so I finally got a second pair and still love the original crocs!  They make an active lifestyle so much easier!  I mostly wear them for working around the house and walking around in and I love them as backup travel shoes for camping or hanging around the hotel.  I tried other crocs but most other styles, although better looking, just aren't as flexible and soft as these originals.

This is my second set of khaki Crocs, I love them. Perfect footwear around house, going to store, camping, beach even water parks. I have flat feet so minimal arch does not bother me, I have occasionally put orthotics in them for extra support (plenty of room), good cushioning in heel and ball of foot, I am a 14 EE and 14 M fit comfortably. I have several Crocs now, will almost certainly always own a few from now on. Only caveat is that they get slippery on smooth surfaces when bottoms gets worn, be careful transitioning from wet out doors to supermarket floors or other smooth surfaces (ATM, etc.)
I love these.  I use them for work.  Got these at a great price too.  I get my 10,000 steps in and my feet don’t hurt at the end of the day.
I have plantar fasciitis so I got this just to wear around the house so not to be bare foot. They are comfy and convenient. Helps my feet quite a bit. Give them a try.
They’re Crocs, and they are replacing my old roughly 10 year old Crocs.  Long lasting, comfortable and I’ll not hesitate to buy another pair in 10 years.
They look nice and feel nice,just not wide enough! I have a really wide foot double E😱

As with all of the other Crocs we've purchased, these are great. Obviously concerned about keeping the white clean, but the fit is perfect and these are a worthy addition to my 13-yr-old's growing Crocs collection.
Crocs changed its formation. This one hit my 3rd and 4th finger. Decided to donate.

I wear an 11W so I got the 11 for men, need to go down half a size or whole size. Just wish they offered it in 10.5 so I could try them. Otherwise these shoes are comfortable to wear around the house.

These are great.  I got them primarily to work in my chicken coop and wanted something that would easily slip on and off, would not be hot, and could easily be cleaned up.  These fit all those criteria.  My only regret is forgetting that chickens cannot resist investigate and pecking at red!

Very comfortable. Great for my intended uses to replace flip flops and to dry my feet out after walking around in boots or being wet all day.  However, the site suggested going up half a size if you are inbetween. I generally wear a 9.5 military boot or a 10 in regular shoes. I went with a 10, and the back strap barely catches on my heel as I take a step.  Fine for walking around on dry ground, indoors, at the pool etc.  However, it's a bit too large to walk around in muck, submerged water (creeks etc) because it just isn't tight enough.  If I purchased again I would actually go down half a size.

Ordered regular size. DROWNING in these shoes.  Too large both width- and length-wise. 3rd pair of Crocs I've tried now.  Others had other problems.  Have heard great things about this brand, but guess I'll give up now.

These Crocs are incredibly durable & comfortable.  I go through 1 pair a year.  I have tried different brands and different styles but I keep coming back to these (Unisex classic clog)  I wear a size 15M in a standard shoe.  Ordered a size 15 and they fit well.  Room around my foot so I don't feel squeezed but not so much that my shoes fall off.  The shoes themselves do stretch over time but as they stretch the shoe also begins molding to my foot which makes it even more comfotable.
I love the color of them. I got them on sale for cyber Monday bc crocs are pretty damn expensive but I love them. Super comfy. Flap up for casual and flap back for partying amen
I bought this to match my pontiac aztek. I love crocs. People give them a lot of hate, but they're comfy as all hell. Best shoes. Hands down.

I love crocs for wearing around the house and garden. Very comfortable and can be hosed off if they get dirty. Initially bought my normal size but they tend to run a bit small so had to return. Bought the next size up and they fit great.

This Crco feels wonderful on my feet. I have a high arch and have pain from wearing other flip-flops and sandals this summer. The doctor suggested getting Crocs because they had a slight arch support. I do recommend this.

I love these crocs so much! I wear them all the time and everywhere. They are the perfect shoes and if you get them dirty, they are super easy to clean off! I wear these during homecoming at school every year and I always get so many compliments on them. They are so comfortable and it takes a LONG time to wear out. I have another pair that I've had for a couple of years and they haven't even started to wear out. I recommend these to everyone no matter the age or size.
My daughter is soooo very happy.  Why oh why did these come back in style??????  OH...I know...theyre super comfy.  LOL  Fits true to size!
My family loves crocs! They are the best in the summer for kids. They can play in the mud with them on and you can just hose them off!
Love my Crocs, have them in many colors. Great for walking on hard surfaces like hard wood and tile
Love my Crocs, have them in many colors. Great for walking on hard surfaces like hard wood and tile

I'm on my feet 12+ hours a day, have a bad back and could loose a few pounds =p. Co-workers suggested Crocs and I resisted, wish I hadn't. Love them. These Duet Sport Men's are longer and wider than the unisex. I usually wear an 8 women's wide and I think I could have used a 5 mens in these instead of the 6 but with socks they still fit. Will be buying more. I think the Duet Sport have a little more cushion than the regular crocs but both are comfortable.

Great. I chose the a size larger than I normally wear (which is what you are supposed to do when using Crocs). Easy to slip on/off. I also added Dr. Scholl's Massaging Gel inserts and Dr. Foot Arch Support inserts. Really comfortable!
I sense great fear in you. You have hate. You have anger. But none of these are as powerful as my need for comfortable shoes...

I have an identical pair of these shoes. I have literally worn the bottoms out and I decided to replace them! I adore these shoes and don't know what I'd do if they ever discontinue them. Excellent quality. Great value.
My daughter and her friends have decided that crocs are cool again. She wears them with elite socks and loves the white crocs with black socks.
Normally an 11.5 and ordered an 11 as recommended. Fit well. Bought as house shoes that wouldn’t make feet sweat and could be easily cleaned - fits the bill!

I bought these for gardening shoes which they are perfect for. I find they are so very comfortable in the summer. This would be my 2nd pair of Crocs classic clog. Its nice to be able to get your feet soaking wet and not worry about my Crocs being destroyed.
I bought these crocs when my baby was born. They are perfect for cutting the grass, manning the charcoal grill, listening to classic rock and go great with cargo pants.
The product would have fit fine if the way it was packed was different.  One of the Crocs was bent in at the inside of the
My husband has been wanting some crocs for awhile, so I finally bought him a pair. He is in love and has worn them everyday since he has received them!

What can I say? They are Crocs and they are comfortable.  I love to slip them on the run outside to put out garbage and other short errands.  Fit perfectly!  The best part was the price, $8!  Can't beat that!
never having worn crocs before, and having canoes for feet, i decided since the price was cheap to give it a shot.  Surprisingly comfortable

This is my second pair of crocs I bought. My foot doc said to buy a pair for indoor shoes. I have high foot arch and was having heal pain in my right foot. Thinking of buying another pair to wear outside for running errands and etc. Very happy that I bought them. I did not want to wear tennis shoes in the house. Next I want to try a pair of the croc Sandals.
Perfect for my daughters birthday. She was very happy . Now my other daughter wants me to get her a pair.
Crocs fit very well going to buy another pair.only thing they only had them in blue

I've purchased the same size and type of crocs for years and years.  This pair was too small.  I set it next to my old pair and it was half and inch shorter. Not sure what quality control was thinking.

I love these. I have had to wear orthotic inserts in shoes for 25 years, and these are the ONLY shoes I do not need the inserts for. I have several pairs, and they are all I wear anymore (except in rain).
My father loves the comfort-ability of these. I on the other hand think they are ok for regular use but begin to hurt on long drives. They turn like concrete after 2 hours IMO.
Teenager request for Christmas present -- exactly what she asked for, shipping was on time and as expected, no issues

Honestly, I'm disappointed.  I've had a pair of crocs duet for a two years now and they are awesome.  Squishy.  Has arch support.  These on the other had are underwhelming.  Less support.  Less cushion.  Less shoe in general.  Maybe I'm not being fair by not reviewing these on their own merit.  But the important point is that not all crocs are the same.
I forgot how comfy crocs were! I was a little nervous about the sizing because some of the reviews, but I order the US 5men/7women and they fit perfectly! I usually wear a size 7 in shoes.
Everything was as described, Good quality, Sizing was accurate, Well packed and ship and I highly recommend this product. Click thumbs up if you found my review helpful. Thanks!
We got these for our daughter and she loves them!  While these may not win any beauty pageants, they are SUPER comfortable, like all Crocs.  They're  a staple in our house for all of us.

I tried crocs on in the store to find out what size i was! My feet are 7.5-8. it sucks that crocs don’t have half sizes. i got an 8, and they fit fine! They do fit a little better in the furry crocs 😊 so easy on & off, comfy. I got them on sale for $15 and had to get them!

My Hubby loves these. Really cousiony and comfy. at first he thought they were a little hard but when they are warmed by your feet they get supple and more squishy. He wanted the brown so that stains wouldn't show up as readily and really likes the color. The only thing he is not so happy about is the size. I ordered his shoe size but the crocs run a bit big. If I ordered again I would go down a size or 2.
I love my other Crocs and these fit the same but what I really like about them is they were only $8 on Cyber Monday!
They're Crocks, what's not to like?  Easy on easy off, feels like slippers and flip flops and a baby! I highly recommend!

These are classic Crocs. You may not score fashion points but the comfort and convenience of Crocs is unrivaled. However if you wear a 8.5 or 39 in European size order the size Men's 7/ Women's 9; Crocs sizing is 39-40 because the size 8 Women's / Men's 6; Crocs size 38-39 was on the small side..my toes were hitting the tops of the shoe..

These crocs are great for my feet, I get a great massage on m feet every time I wear them. I have diabetes, these shoes have helped me with neuropathy pain, I'm guessing because of the massage like feel to my feet.
I love the color of these crocs. The fit is a little loose but they will be fine. You can't go wrong with Crocs and the price was very doable. Shipping was super fast too!

I have had a pair of Crocs for years and they were still comfortable. I ordered these new ones a week ago and they arrived very fast. WOW! They are very comfortable, I guess my old ones were wore out but they lasted a long time and still felt great. I walk on cement and tile all day and they help comfort my feet and help my back.

Bought these for my husband's Mickey Mouse costume but was pleasantly surprised with how well they fit!  We bought our last pair of crocs several years ago and the old ones have poor foot support but these are made differently. These new ones have a harder plastic and more arch support so even though he wouldn't try to wear them all day, he wears them around the house in the evenings or for quick errands (whereas the old ones were strictly water shoes due to lack of foot support).
My husband has size 16W feet and the size 16 fits perfectly. We got him a size 15 first and the fit well without the strap down but a little too snug when used with the strap on in water.
Size & width are half size to full size larger & wider than usual.
Has a small deformity on the left shoe, inspectors should of caught it.  It does not effect the use of the shoe but can be seen up close.
Am extremely disappointed that these "womens size 8" clogs are a full size at least larger than my size 8 foot.

I am a longtime crocs fan and was excited to get a new pair for the Xmas Amazon deal price. Unfortunately, I haven’t ordered new ones in awhile and they are now a good half size smaller. I guess they thought they could short a bit of plastic to save money? I returned them and didn’t reorder since the price went back up. Bummer!

These Crocs are the most comfortable, supportive, and durable shoe to wear for so many reasons.  Whether you are a professional who's on your feet 24/7, a busy Mom on her feet at home (especially good if you stand on tile), or need a comfy shoe to slip into while in the backyard or to run errands .  .  . these Crocs fit well and last.  Navy blue is great year-round color and the sizing is perfect.  I wear a 7, 7.5 and 8 in some shoes, but this size 7 Croc is perfect for me! I'm glad they are still available; this is my second pair.  The first pair lasted about 7-8 years!

They run large I should have bought a size 9 instead of 10 and I wear a 10-1/2 shoe. But they are comfortable and come highly recommended by Dead Pool. So yeah...... there's that. Don't get that reference ask you kids.

If you have classic crocs that you bought 5 years ago you'll find these running smaller than those did. That is, big for shoes, small for crocs. They are a little shorter, a little narrower and especially not as high in the toe box (i.e. lower profile). I wear 8 1/2 wide in standard women's shoes, and 8W, 6M in crocs was always perfect for me before. Now I think I would order a size up next time, even on what Croc bills as a "roomy" fit. Apart from fit they are the crocs we know and love (or hate as the case seems to be), nice bouncy feel, easy to clean, durable and perfect for everything but ballroom dancing.

I live in these shoes!  So comfy and lightweight, yet still have better toe protection than a lot of “regular” shoes. Been doing yard work for years in these. And they get washed with the dishes or in the shower with me!
These were for me and my husband.  We wear them all the time.  Great for our tile floor. Keeps away the tired legs when you stand a while in the kitchen.

WOW!  My first pair of Crocs and I love them!  I usually wear a size 8 women's shoe, but it has to be a WIDE width and I have a very high arch so I need shoes that are not too tight across the top.  The size 8 Crocs are roomy and comfy and just right.
I like these. Just a tiny bit small on my right foot, which is a bit larger than left, but I didnt want to go a whole size up.  Wish they came in half sizes.

These are a lot lighter than I expected, however they are very comfortable.  I use them for wearing around the house instead of having to put on shoes.  I keep the strap forward and have no problems with them staying on my feet.  My daughter loved them so much, we got a pair for her too.

These Crocs appear the same as the ones I had a long time ago.  With the word "Classic" I thought I was getting the same thing -- they are except they have added noticeable small "bumps" on the inside sole of the shoe (possibly for traction) which, frankly, makes it feel like you have small pebbles in the shoe while wearing them.  Otherwise, I would have given more stars
I like that they are well constructed and are comfortable.  I just wish that they had a higher arch. I need more arch support than the average gal.

I suppose I could go with 3 or 5 stars. But I only use crocs for camping, fishing or canoeing. So I guess they get 4 stars. If you love crocs then they're a 5. If not, probably lower. They work exactly as I expect them to.

I think this is my fifth or sixth pair of Crocs and they've all been great. I have two very arthritic ankles that don't like anything in the way of impacts or jarring and Crocs are basically all a pad, so they really help keep the ankles happy. The new ones always feel a little weird with the fresh nubs on the inside, but I adjust quickly. (My older Crocs have the nubs pretty much worn down.)
Good quality for Crocs.  My daughter loves them.  Not good for lots of standing.  Not a lot of support.

As some other reviewers have mentioned, there seems to be a consistency issue with manufacturing these things. 10 years ago, I bought a size 10/12, and they were awesome! Every other pair I've purchased since then have run a bit large. This last pair was a perfect fit, just like the og pair 10 years ago. I'm so happy with this new pair, I'm considering buying a second pair right now!

Way too expensive for what they are but I need them for my lifeguard job. I wear a 7 in women’s usually with room but these are a 7 and my toe is all the way to the end so hopefully it doesn’t wear them quickly. They are comfy and do what I need them to do. If you are hesitant on size. I wish I’d upped one more size.

Like Big Macs and Quarter Pounders with Cheese, a pair of Crocs is going to be the same every time you buy it.  These replaced a worn out pair.  This pair was bought as a gift, but the recipient always keeps two pairs of Crocs on hand; one for indoor use and one for outdoors.

My girlfriend had an old pair of crocs, which I coveted.  So I finally decided to buy myself a pair on amazon. I based my size on the pair my GF had... which tended toward the small size.  As in: her lady size 9 fit my lady size 10 foot.  But when my new crocs arrived in the mail they were too small.  Should've ordered at 10. Which is my foot size.  Let this be a cautionary tale for you, weary traveler: Buy the shoe size you are, not the half-forgotten-dream of a shoe size your girlfriend wears.
My daughter loves these...she's in middle school. The price was right. Glad we purchased these
I ordered these shoes based on size I take and color.  I love them!  Very comfortable to wear every day.
Finding a size 15 shoe, of any kind, is a chore for my grandson but here we found a croc...size 15. Makes it easier for him to go canoeing. Thanks.

I bought a 2 pairs about 2 months ago in my size 9.  Then I ordered a black pair that was the same Crocs unisex classic model I had bought in navy.  The black pair too small.  If I go up a size it may be too big.  I don't know what to expect.

These are good shoes to wear while doing yard work. I knew they would be because I read the reviews. It's summer so I won't wear to town but will in the winter when I'm wearing long pants. They are very comfortable and seem well made. I would buy again. Thinking about getting my husband a pair to wear while mowing. :-)
Great shoe, but had to order size larger than I normally wear.
Bought a 9 and it was much too small. Returned and got a 10. The 10s are the same size as my older size 9 crocs. Stop messing with the sizes

My feet have been killing me! I bought these in desperation to save them. They feel very comfortable. 9 men fit perfectly. I wear a 9.5 sneaker. I use them strictly in the house and I bought ortho inserts for my NB running sneakers. They say not to walk barefoot for a while but these crocs are nice in the house and easy to clean. I went to the doctors and got a inflammatory gel which is working great. I had plantar fasc for almost 6 mos in both feet. So with the combination of these three things I'm starting to feel better.
A croc is a croc. My 12 yr old son loves these to wear at the local pool. They fit him as expected and always last until he grows out of them.

I gave 2 stars for the ease of returning & the color! Too expensive for this product. I wear an 8-1/2. The 8 was too short but also very wide. I Loved the color- that's the only good thing. Returned & bought an off brand for a much lower price.
Bought these for working on our foodtruck.  OH MY GOSH.  SUPER COMFORTABLE. I ALREADY BOUGHT MORE.
Crocs are the most comfortable shoes I have every worn! I have many, many styles and colors. I bought these to wear as summer slippers to match my lightweight robe.
i knew ahead of time these ran wide, and that is why i bought them. when i broke my foot they were literally the only shoe it could get on... very good as far as support and durability too
This is the 2nd pair, purchased with the 1st pair - different color.  My husband now has 2 new pair to wear and his feet are saying "thank you".

I was concerned about the fit when ordering. I take size 9B and have successfully worn the unisex All Stars in size 7 men/9 women. So I ordered the same in these Crocs and they are comfortable, lightweight, easy to clean after garden work, and well ventilated for Florida weather. Too bad the public seems to find them hideous to look at, but I purchased them for around the house and garden anyway so I give them 5 stars. I am contemplating a second pair in black.
Great kick around the house shoes.  Better than slippers.  Cool on your feet and they look decent too.

This shoe fit a little smaller than the same ones I ordered a couple years ago. I'm a solid womens 8.5 and the 8 worked for me (with a little stretching) last time, but I couldn't stretch the 8 in these enough. Recommend ordering a size up (and shrinking if needed) if it's been a few years since the last time you ordered.

Buying crocs can be a touch and go situation depending on the type and where they are made. These are made in Mexico and the fit is very good. I have purchased the Bistro version also. They are made in China on what appears to be different mold sizes. They tend to be either too tight or too loose, depending on size. This is a shame because they are more attractive without the vent holes.

Crocs has the best casual slippers available! Especially for the price they sell them on amazon they are made with great quality and immense comfort. I know from my last pair they last for a long time. I look forward to buying them again in the future
Quality dropped ever since they are manufactured in Mexico.  My old and original Classic one is worn and flat but still somewhat feel more happy light than just hard light.

I purchased a pair of this same shoe several years ago to help with plantar faciitis. They worked like a miracle for me. I have worn them down to where the inside and bottom are completely  smooth. So I decided to order the same shoe again.  I ordered the same size as before, but the new ones are a little smaller. But, thats a good thing because the 1st pair was a little  big.  Both pair still fit well even with the slight difference in size. When I wear this new pair out, I'm sure I will order another pair.

Not real sure how I feel about these shoes. They seem fine for going to the beach in or casual running errands but they are not nearly as comfortable as solomons or keen. They are extremely ugly, do not offer alot of support. But the soles feel soft and are comfortable enough to work a few hours in. Soooooo ugly!!

Old Crocs say 6-7 size.  Reviews say order larger.  Ordered size 8, way too big. Ordered size 6, too small.  Ordered size 7 just right.  Amazon says free returns, put too large or small as reason, not ordered wrong size.
Purchased these for my grandpa who loves them so much. He wears them everywhere, all the time. With or without socks. He loves the foam, light feel with good support.

Bought these for my husband to replace his 'ruby slippers,' after the Aussie-Collie pup chewed on them, like they were a toy! Imagine!  So- same great fit and function, just don't forget they will need a liner of some kind. Uh, the rubber-type liner was the FIRST thing the pup went after. (This time we tried Barney-Garnet.)

My 14-year-old daughter absolutely loves these shoes, and I am pretty sure she has not taken them off since she got them. She says they are "crazy comfortable" and she's "never going back to regular shoes." Fit great. Fast delivery. And they are very croc-y. Exactly what she wanted .
Live in these all summer with jeans.  I love that I can pitch them in the washer from time to time.  Great for gardening.  Light weight.

I love crocs.  The sizes are inconsistent.  Out of 10 pair that I purchased, I kept 5 pair.  It is great that there are free returns, it eliminates the rick from inconsistent sizes.  Once I find a pair of crocs that fit, I can wear them all day at the beach, walking along the shore, or going to the store / driving.

I think everyone knows by now what Crocs are. So I won't explain other than to say that they're very comfortable for the beach and pool, can get wet without any problems. Unfortunately I had another pair that were about five years old that I let sit in the sun too long and they actually did warp and no longer fit properly. Hence why I bought the new pair :-)

I don't know what happened.  I've bought Crocs from Amazon before and have been very happy, but not this time.  I ordered a pair of 10/12 unisex crocs from Ultimate Shoe Zone for my husband and they were significantly undersized even though they say they are the same size and model as he currently has.  Not only are they way too small but they are warped around the heel area.  We will have to return them since they don't come close to fitting.
Great addition to my scrubs, just ordered some really cute socks.
True to size. Extremely comfortable. Took me a while to give in and listen to everyone around me about Crocs. But they’re right. Very good for standing long hours. Great arch support and comfort.

This is my first pair of Crocs and I love them!  I have a wide foot and comfort is key.  Crocs reminded me of the white "earth shoes" I wore back in the 70's & 80's while working in the medical field.  I remembered they weren't the most attractive shoes (looked like I had "duck feet") but they were comfortable.  I have friends that wear Crocs and decided to give them a try.  I usually wear an 8-1/2 or 9 and was torn between sizes.  Crocs recommends you order down to the next whole size if you are in-between sizes.  I ordered Classic Crocs / size W9 and I thought they were slightly longer than I needed so I ordered an 8 to be sure.  The length of the foot bed for the 8 was fine but I found the toe box to be a little snug on my littlest toe.  I kept the 9's and am glad I did.  I work in an office of a manufacturing plant with a casual dress code. Most of the building has concrete floors and the Crocs are just perfect for me.  I have since bought another pair in a different color and a pair of Crocs sandals.  The Classic Crocs clogs have ventilation so my feet don't get too hot like they might have in some of the closed styles.  I know Crocs have been around a long time and I don't know why it took me so long to try a pair.  I'm very happy I did.
AWWWWWWWWWWW THAT'S A REAL CROC, NOT A KNOCKOFF! MY FIRST PAIR OF THE REAL ONES AND BOY HAVE I BEEN MISSING OUT. LOVEEE THESE AND HUBBY WANTED SOME TOO SO HIS CAME TODAY. HE LOVES THEM TOO.

Had/have plantar fasciitis and crocs are the only shoe I could tolerate comfortably until the swelling left my foot. On days when it is aggravated again, revert from shoes with a support insert back to my crocs.  I have also given up my faithful slippers and use only crocs as my slippers when in the house. Their arch support "for me" is perfect and my foot doc agreed that they are pretty good for that type footwear.  The half price sale amazon had was the perfect time to buy a couple more pairs.
I don't care how they look.  They are functional, easy to pack, waterproof, washable, and most of all, cheap.
I LOVE crocs.  And did not know i could get them on Amazon.  I had some crocs with the size on the bottom so I knew my size.  ordered them and they came within 2 days.  Fit perfectly.

I've always heard how comfortable these were but never believed it. Hate the feeling of shoes on bare feet and rubbery sandals always give me blisters. These are every bit as comfortable as people say, and I can wear them all day with no socks and get no blisters.
I liked my first pair of Crocs so much, when they wore out,  I wanted another pair.
Very comfortable, very good price.

These are the original unisex Crocs. My husband likes to wear these around the house and working in the yard. They are comfortable and have air vents - but his favorite thing about them is that they are "bunion-friendly." I like the chocolate color.

The peripheral neuropathy in my feet has become progressively worse--to the point where I was no longer able to wear stylish shoes. A friend recommended I try these, and after buying several pairs of "therapeutic" shoes for close to $100 each, I decided it was worth a try. What could I lose at this price? Thank goodness for her recommendation. These are the only shoes my feet can bear. I wear them to work every day (black and brown go with most clothes). I know this sounds melodramatic, but these shoes are the answer to my prayers!
Love these for work, I can wash and dry them very easily if something gets spilt on them. I usually wear a 10/10.5 and went for the 10, they fit perfectly!

Ran larger than a normal men's size 14 shoe, but it has been great for using an orthotic foot bed insert, which amazingly doesn't slip out while walking, even when the strap is placed towards the front instead of around the heel.

This was my first time wearing crocs so i decided to buy 2 different pairs and researched which ones were the widest. Well these ones ended up not being very wide at all. The baya style crocs are wider. I really wanted these to fit but they squeeze the sides of my wide feet!
Perfect for outside (rainy, muddy, gardening).  Comfortable fit.  Fit as expected.  Wear with our without backstrap.  Pretty color.
I am not a huge fan of this style of Crocs but I needed something to wear inside the house due to plantar fasciitis. These work perfect-easy on and easy off. I love the color, too!

Had surgery on both feet back in January.  After my first post op visit my doctor suggested roomy shoes, like crocs.  So I purchased the Crocs Classic Clog and I must say that they are roomy and comfortable.  I was glad to get out of the black surgery shoes.  Everything else that I tried to fit into, hurt to slip my foot in and most shoes I couldn't get my foot in due to the swelling and soreness of my feet.  Use Crocs after foot surgery.

Bought these to replace an identical pair I had bought a few years ago.  The new pair was a 1/2 " shorter in length than the old pair, so my toes rubbed the inside of the clog.  The new pair was also narrower in width than the old pair, which I was ok with.  I ended up sending them back.  I would have exchanged them for the next size up, but I didn't want to have to send them back if they didn't fit.

I have been wearing crocs for years, and these were just as expected except for the size.  Buyers beware.  I ordered the same size and style of unisex classic  crocs as my old ones.  They were significantly shorter.  Exchanged to the next size up, and they were identical to the old ones.  I could not have been mistaken because the size was still visible imprinted on the bottom of the old shoes.  I would give them 5 stars because I like crocs, but feel forced to downgrade because of size inconsistency.  How hard can it be to make a molded shoe conform to size?

I love these shoes, they are comfy for the foot and after walking all day at work and climbing stairs I don't get blisters or achy feet. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because if I don't have the strap down, the heel part shreds my socks
You can't beat Crocs! They feel great on your feet. I ordered these for my son and ordered the wrong size. The return was very easy!
I was very happy to see these in size 15 as that size is not readily available in any shoe.

Do you like to wear sandals with no socks just like God intended? But you have feet complexity and dont like to show them on public? Crocks are just made for you!! Very comfortable, you can wet them no problem, can use sucks with them like the degenerate that you are and wont look as bad and the material+design are so good. Get'em

I love these shoes! They are so comfortable and adding Jibbitz can make them so much fun. They are very versatile with the strap. You can use them as a comfy, casual shoe with the strap up, or you can put the strap back and they will stay on your foot perfectly. Overall THESE ARE AMAZING!!!

My daughter has worn out her old pair of clogs, and this was what she wanted for Christmas. Though she hasn't seen them yet, I know she will love them, since they are her favorite color - PURPLE! She is a beautiful young lady, who has Down syndrome, and she knows what she wants! This is it!! So glad to make her happy!
I love crocks. Or at least I used to. These are nothing like the crocks I bought, loved and wore since 2008. Cheap feel with none of the support.
A gift for my daughter.  She loves Crocs!  The only complaint she has is that she needs to wear socks with the shoes, otherwise the raised massage design hurts her feet.

Classic Crocs.  Fits well and performs as expected.  You're not gonna attract potential mates with them but they are comfortable when you need to be alone. A good drinking shoe I might add. Only thing I could ding it for is that they are not as padded/soft as previous pairs of the same version.
Great crocs, same as crocs I bought 8 years ago. Normally a 7.5 and ordered a 7 because the 8's were huge on me. Hope this helps.
These are vibrant yellow and my daughter LOVES them! They were a great price on amazon, too.

I have the worst time buying shoes online...not sure why I continue to do it, but I ordered what I thought would be a larger size for my foot and it ended up being a snug fit.  Can't wear with thick socks like I want to in the winter, but they will be fine for the summer months.

I have worn Crocs for years but these are the cheapest yet. They have blems and feel much lighter because there is less sole support than before. The price is a few dollars less but the quality has definitely suffered.  Having said that if you are a confirmed wearer, blem Crocs are better than none.

I love the Classic Clog! This is exactly what I was looking for. Although they are not the best looking, they are great none the less. I mainly wear these around the house and I plan on taking them on a trip by plan. I will reevaluate them at the end of the month. But so far these are the most comfortable shoe I have!

love this clunky little things, however, the fit is SO difficult. Have several different styles and as many of the reviews say, there is MUCH variance in the fit. While the length of these is accurate 7W/5M (I wear 6.5 normally) they are SO huge, I would need a couple of pairs of socks to keep them on. Returning.
Got these as a gift for our kids. They're super-handy to slip on every time you need to do some chore like get the mail, take out the trash, etc. They wash up in the washing machine great too.
these are PERFECT I love them, the size I got is great it's snug and cozy. I got the size 7 I think.
My first pair of crocs, believe it or not. What was I waiting for? LOVE them! Unbelievably light and comfortable. Yes, I'll be getting more!!

I have quite a Crocs collection. These fit just like all my other Classic Crocs so no surprises there. I used these white ones with Holiday Shoe Charms (aka Jibbitz) and red/white striped soccer socks during the Christmas season. Everyone thought they were a hoot!
No surprises. all as expected as I am wearing these for more than a decade. This is the first and classic model from Crocs (formerly called "Beach").

I love crocs as they are so comfortable all day on our fishing boat. I had the regular boat shoes that would kill my feet from the cords built in the shoes and just cannot wear them though they were pricey to boot! (no pun intended) Great summer shoes when you live by the water. I even have an old pair (5 years now lol ) that I use as house shoes!  P.S. Seems that they never wear out-another plus

My daughter loves them! She plays soccer and they are a lot more comfortable then slides and can fit well even with thick socks. All the girls are wearing them, which is hard to believe being that they aren't the nicest looking shoe. Got them at a great price, too! Cheaper than in the stores.

My son has a pair of crocs we bought 3 summers ago and they're still in great shape minus some wear -- but of course his feet have outgrown them. So, we bought these crocs and about 2 wks ago - less than 2 mos worth of wear - the straps on both of the shoes broke off! They should last a LOT longer than that.
I got these for my granddaughter ( from her list) and she loves them. They are light, comfy and fit good

Even though the chart said to round down to the nearest size if you wear, for example 8 1/2 go to 8, I went to a 9 since I was going to be wearing thermal socks with them a I ordered them to wear in the winter due to a toe condition. The size 9 fit perfectly with the socks on, but the shoe will probably be a little big to wear without socks in the summer. They are very comfortable shoes. I gave a 4 rather than a 5 star as the straps are a slightly different length on each shoe.

This my third pair of Crocs and I wear my Crocs everywhere  that I go. They are light and comfortable and my feet feel great. I even wear them as indoor slippers. There are some expensive shoes that just now sit in my closest.  They fit as expected and 2 day delivery.
Excellent, comfortable and wearable. Been wearing crocs a long time and that should tell you what and all you need to know !!!
Crocs do run on the smaller size, so I recommend ordering one size larger than your normal size.  Otherwise these are a great and comfortable shoe.  Even my six year old daughter wanted a pair!

I love this style of crocs and have been wearing for over 10 years! Love this color. I like the small open sections around the front of shoe as this cools my feet.  I'm a nurse and they go well with my uniform. Thanks!

I really like these, but they are more snug than others I have purchased in the same size. In the past they have loosened up over time, but these seem to run smaller than they used to. I would suggest trying them on at a store first.
Bought these for my daughter who is a Rugger. She loves them and her teammates are also buying them too. As a mom, they are better than muddy goose poppy cleets. Lol
Awesome for beachwear! They are comfy and fit great! -- they do make squeaky noises like a duck when you walk after a lot of use. But its bearable!
I bought so many pairs of these! I used to make fun of people who wear these, then I got some. Now I have a pair for outside, inside and a pair for each person in the family! Sooooooo comfy!

I typically buy size 12 US shoes I ordered an 11 in the crocs and they fit perfectly and after owning a pair of Indianapolis Colts crocs and wearing them daily for 10years as house shoes I know the fit will just improve and almost mold to my feet. my only complaint with the classic crocs is the sole can be very slippery on wet surfaces, the sell models with better soles but i couldnt find any with the vents like the classic.
Bought for my husband and fits perfectly as expected. He loves the Crocs and got it at good price. Would buy again.

Replaced a pair of tan Crocs my son in law lost at the lake.  He is thrill with them and wears them everywhere.  Not much to say, they are Classic Crocs, most people who are shopping for these, know what they are.
I have another pair just like these. Same style, size and color. These run small and are very uncomfortable.
Bought as a present for my brother. wore his last red pair of crocks for about 10 years. I got these to replace his old ones. They had just about worn through the soles.  Great product.
These were the perfect gift for my husband! The croc brand is a great quality, they fit true to size, and my husband says the arch support is amazing! I’d definitely recommend!

A while back, my mom had found crocs at a local store that fit perfectly, but she wanted some more colors of them.  This style seemed to match what she had, and fit so well, and this works perfectly-- she has problems with swelling in her feet, but wearing these crocs instead of other shoes, she doesn't have the problems.  She doesn't feel like she has to jam her foot into these crocs because there is just enough room for her foot.  She likes them a lot!!
I remember crocs fitting a bit more loose than this. They are a bit too hard for my liking as well.

My last Crocs were US mens 15 and made in China, fit perfect. These are the new Unisex size that are mens 15 and are made in Mexico. I cannot were these with the strap down but they work ok with the strap up. Not returning but will order one size larger from now on.
You can be sure of having  weekends all to yourself when sporting these bad boys.
Crocs are the most comfortable shoes I've ever had for my flat feet.

I order crocs for the entire family for summer and our upcoming camping trip. I had an issue with quality control as one of the straps that was meant to hold my foot in was too long. It ended up being even with the back part of the shoe rendering it useless. The other shoe was fine and was about 1/4 to 1/2 inch shorter allowing for my foot to be secure. Of of the other 3 pairs I have this is the only defect but heard quality had diminished since they are made in Mexico now and not China.
I wear 7.5 shoes. These are 8's. They're a little bit large, but very comfy to wear. I like the little bit of extra space. I'd buy again.

Sizes do not match. if the description says it is 9, then it should be 9. With the croc I got, the size on it, it is 9, but it actually is 10. In other words if you ordered 2 Crocs with size 9, you might a get somehow a smaller or larger even though both Crocs are labeled as 9. (9 is an example, it could be any size like 8. 9. 10 etc.)
I can only wear Crocs because of a medical condition. They are perfect, comfortable and a life-saver.

I started wearing Crocs when I began college in Boulder, CO, which is the birthplace of Crocs.  I'll continue to wear Crocs out of loyalty, but I'm not  ecstatic about these "classic" Crocs.  I put classic in quotation marks, because Crocs loyalists know that they were once made in the USA, and the shoes that were made in the USA were sized in ranges and were made of superior material that was a tad bit softer.  Please know that I'm traditionally not a hooah-hooah "Made in the USA" minion, but there are distinct differences between the USA- and Mexican-made Crocs.  Crocs made in Mexico are made of a similar (but different) material that has a slippery finish, and they are sized in whole-sizes only.  I resisted buying Mexican Crocs because of these material and fit factors, and so I wore down my USA Crocs to the end.

I love Crocs and was unable to find the white ones anywhere so happy to have found them here on Amazon. These are the most comfortable shoes ever! These are the "classic" which have the holes for ventilation a must if you have sweaty feet or have ever suffered from athletes feet or a fungal infection. I am happy to report I no longer suffer from a fungal infection with over the counter topical fungi care and Crocs my feet are ready for summer!!

Not the best looking shoe, but great to wear around the house. These are great for shorter tasks such as taking out trash, light yard work, or a short walk. Provide for a more secure footing than flipflops and are reasonably comfortable. I wear 11.5 US and the size 12 Crocs fit perfect for me.

This footwear fit my needs perfectly.  I was looking for all-weather, all-terrain footgear that is quick to put on and quick to take off.  Slip-on's were a must.  I use them for walking around outside my house, which means I'm walking in dirt, grass, on cement, on a wooden deck, and so forth.  I also use them for boating on a pontoon boat and for general, quick around-town use.  These clogs fit the bill perfectly.  They are durable, don't get dirty easily, are very easy to clean, and provide the foot with protection without stifling the foot.  I'm very satisfied with this product.  One caveat only - they wear a bit small in size for me, so I had to order a half-size larger than shoe size.  I'm a 10 1/2 in shoe size, and a size-11 croc fit perfectly.
Bought these for the teen who thinks they are cool. These are ugly as sin. I told her you’ll look like Mario batalli :/ they have held up and are still so ugly.
If you’re 12 and looking for Crocs, here ya go. The price was perfect, size is as expected and 12 year old is as happy as can be. Great color choices.

Love love love! Very happy with my new Classic Crocs. They are well-made, super comfortable and very cute. I chose them in Lilac and it's a beautiful shade. Nice arch support and they're shock absorbing, so my feet are happy whenever I wear them. A podiatrist once told me he approves of Crocs as footwear that are good for the feet. I think I want another pair soon...maybe in the Storm color, next time. :-)
I have always thought Crocks were ugly and stupid. Once I put them on my feet I know why people wear them. Great support and a thick heal. I still think they are ugly even as I wear them.

But so so ugly. The brown is a pretty nice color, hafta say. If you are avoiding these because you see all those kids wearing them and you think you would never be caught dead in them, do not order them. Because once you try them on, you'll have to explain why you've backtracked so significantly. I have even caught myself thinking "they're not *that* ugly." But they are, and I am deluded because they are so comfy.
Wear a size 9.5 so got a 9 and it fit perfect. Boyfriend peer pressured me into it but I actually love them!

I ordered size 9, thinking they might fit since they are wide. I wear a 9.5, so when I got them my toe was already hitting the top.  I returned them and ordered a 10 and they are perfect and even with socks, they still fit. I really enjoy these, they are so comfy.
These are like somewhat small but somewhat large too. Very strange and bumpy where your foot goes. They were light and didn't make my feet hurt but I just feel like I can't get comfortable.

Bought these on a one day deal....great price, less than $10.  Love Crocs. I usually wear 7 women’s in flats, so knowing these styles of crocs are a roomier fit, I ordered the 6. Fit is perfect. Love the pale pink color.

I ended up buying up one size in these shoes from what I normally wear. I find that this type of shoe is more comfortable if it is just a tad too big rather than too small. They are very comfortable and provide good support for my feet. I have plantar fasciitis and these definitely are very comfortable.
Perfect fit! Bought size 11 men. Comfortable, durable shoe. Bought for my teenage son. He loves them.
If you're buying Crocs, you clearly either don't care all that much about you fashion choices or you're not planning on wearing them out in public. I'm in the latter group.
I love using Crocs as house shoes instead of slippers. I expect these will last longer than my knock-offs did, and they lasted for ten years! And I love the color!
These are so comfortable! I was hesitant at first but I so happy that I ordered these!

Crocks are what I expected for my intended use.  .. the swimming pool.  But, guessing the appropriate size was confusing.. I could have used a size  or half a size larger.  I can use them the way they are but bigger would have been a bit more comfortable.
Gift for my Granddaughter.  She wears them all the time,guess it was  a good Christmas  gift.
I thought they would have been a little wider, but they get the job done. I use them for camping trips and quick "in and out" shoes to take out the trash, get the mail, check out the garden.
Perfect size, perfect comfort, still gets me through my 12 hour nursing shifts.

I would suggest ordering a size smaller than you usually wear. I wear a 15 in almost all shoes. I ordered the 14/15 size and found them to be much too large. I sent them back and didn't try a smaller size.

We got this pair for my daughter to wear around the house so that our puppy doesn't eat her toes and/or socks (and since my Crocs kept getting borrowed).  She loves them.  The blue is a soft light blue.  Some of the others were a little more electric and we were nervous this might be dull, but it is pretty.  Happy feet here!
Cute shoes!  I normally wear a women's 8, but they didn't have any left.  I got the men's size 6, and it is perfect!

They were for my daughter and she was very happy with them. That is, until they ended up at the bottom of a lake :) We have always enjoyed crocs and I would recommend them to anyone. Very happy with this purchase.
I like Crocs and have some that fit right.  These unisex (for me) are way to wide and clumsy looking.
Bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas.  They fit as expected and were a big hit.
These seem pretty comfy. Great price at $19 they do run about a 1/2 size smaller than they say.
Very comfy and functional while cooking in the kitchen and walking along the beach.
I'm a 38 in european sizes, which is an 8 in Canada and 7.5 in the US. I first ordered the 7.5 US size as I assumed that it would be similar in sizing but it's actually a bit small.
Easy slip-on, comfort, strap used when needed or tucked away when not wanting to use it.
Love love lovr my pink Crocs. I were them all the time. And I got them on sale for $15 of definitely no complaints!
I bought these as a Christmas present for my daughter. She loves them!  They run a little larger than expected, but that's probably due to the wide width. Overall very happy with these crocs

The size is pretty much what I expected.  I thought the Crocs were a little overpriced for what you get, but they are very comfortable for wearing around the house.  I am an old guy and I have to have a slightly elevated heel to keep from having leg problems.  These crocs fit the bill really well.
These shoes are comfortable and easy to take on/off. These shoes fit as expected. Great product!
Very comfortable shoes. I already had 2 pairs when I bought these. Would buy again

I was a little disappointed with the size.  I always wear a size 37 but these seem to be a little snug.  Other than that, I like them.  They're very comfortable.  Will probably buy more, but the next size larger.

Seeing/hearing all the craze about Crocs I wanted to give them a try as my slippers / around-the-house footwear.  Unfortunately, within minutes of putting them on my feet started sweating a lot (and I was just sitting so it's not like there was an extra perspiration due to some heavy physical activity) to the point of visible droplets on the footbed and the sides.  That was a deal breaker for me (thankfully Amazon has a free return option!)

Simewhat large. If no socks are worn, they are extreamly uncomfortable. I bought these for support for my arch at night when I have to go to the bathroom. Putting socks on is not an option at this time of night. And the crocks are to uncomfortable with out them.
The clogs are great.  I use them inside our house to keep my feet off of the tile floors.  I wear a size 12 shoe and the size 12 clogs fit like a glove.
These shoes aren't the most attractive but for what I need them for they are awesome and the price is very reasonable.
Nothing to say except that they're original crocs and the kids love. Fit as expected.
BEEN WEARING CROCS FOR YEARS AND LOVE THEM!! GOT TWO PAIRS RIGHT NOW!! CAN NOT DO WITHOUT THEM!!

I ordered my correct size but shoes were somewhat small. I had to return shoes. Next time I will order 1 size up. I wish this was advertised to order 1 size up. I reordered 1 size up received another pair. These shoes fit perfectly. Very comfortable.

Being in steel toe boots all day can take a toll on your feet when working 24 hours shifts at the Firehouse.  These crocs are great to wear around the station to give our feet a break.  Also, a huge plus so that we don’t cross contaminate by wearing our work boots in the Station.  Love these!
Bought these in a size 10 and they are very true to size.  Great quality and color.

I loved the color and style, but the crocs were too large and wide.So I sent the merchandise back to the company. I wanted to exchange for a smaller size, but was not offered the choice. Instead, I was only offered the choice to receive a refund back to my credit card, but I also used my gift card of $11.00 as well.
I like CROCS and its durability. But this time it's a shock seeing the strap broken on 2nd day of usage. Not sure the stock is real old.

Crocs were way too large, tried it on just one foot and I rattled around because of the oversize even though I can wear size 11 on some shoes.  I didn't want to try to guess how many sizes to go down, if I reordered, so I just returned them.  They look very nice, and I might buy them, if I could figure out what size to order!
I mean, I don't know entirely why these are listed as "Women's" Crocs- but they're the real deal. Comfy, simple, and light.

What can I say?  ARe they ugly, or cute?  I work in an environment where I am on my feet and I need to be quiet.  I have worked in these for years.  They do build up a lot of static energy in the winter on carpeting.
I didnt think I would like these.  They look derpy..... but they feel so GOOD!!! So I will keep rocking them.

Love my Crocs.  Always have always will.  This version of the "classic" fits a little closer to the foot than the last version.  I thought that might be an issue at first - but it wasn't.  I had my last pair of "classics" for years.  They still looked great - but I am so glad I got a new pair.  I had not realized how much the bottom had worn down and how much traction and cushion I was missing.  These are great shoes.
Came in mailer (no box). Official Crocs. Fit great same size as my last pair!  The most comfortable footwear ever.
Legit Crocs brand. Love the yellow color. I caught these at the perfect price. These are good “go to shoes” for convenience.
These don't disappoint. They are the most comfortable slip on. I purchased these for my special needs daughter that likes an easy shoe to slip on and off. Love it!
I ordered one size up as I wear them around house on hard floor along with slipper socks(that’s why I ordered a size up as socks are thick). Love the mint color too.
I used the size chart provided and worked perfect for me.  I have a x-wide foot but ordered the "normal" width and it is great.
great, i wear them with socks
Comfy and authentic, true to color. Would buy again.
I love these but in the winter, when I wear them with socks they eat holes in the heals of the socks in no time. The little nubs are deadly to socks.
very comfortable, but makes feet smelly ….runs wide and large.. I would get next size down for myself.
Great for casual yachting,
I finally gave in and got myself a pair or crocs.  I'm using it for gardening. I love that I didn't pay alot for this.. Color is great too!
This pair of crocs was a replacement for pair that finally wore out. This is the exact same pair that i threw out so you can see I am very happy with them.
Got them for my son who’s always outside, these are good quality fit great and are durable

I purchased the Crocs for my daughter's birthday, she specifically asked for orange and I thought it was going to be impossible finding orange size 13 womans.  As usual, Amazon came through for me.  (I also found tons of Jibbitz for a fraction of the price in the Croc store!
Great for the boat, the beach, walking to the mailbox, washing your car, and

Gave these to my Mom for Mother's Day, and she was very happy to get them as her old pair were quite worn out.  They fit her comfortably, and left some room for socks.  The price was right, and we were both very happy!
Ordered for my wife she hasn't taken them off since we received them she loves them
Wearing Crocs is like wearing Clown Shoes. just really, really comfortable Clown Shoes...!

I bought these a size up from my normal so that I could wear them in the end of my pregnancy. Unfortunately they don’t fit very well because my feet are so swollen, but I love that they are easy to get off and on when my swelling isn’t too bad.
Of course after the window to return these closed the strap broke off.

Extremely comfortable shoes for those who stand on their feet for a significant amount of time each day.  I just love these Crocks (my second set) and wear them in the Winter with socks and in the summer without them.  Great buy!
These are very neat.  I got them for a good friend and he thinks they are neat too.
Had to have my Crocs before they are not available anymore. Love these shoes!!
Got these for my son for Christmas and he loves them. They are super comfortable and easily slipped on and off
fits perfect, light and comfortable should have bought these a long time ago,  I use around the house also, will be getting another pair for the pool,

Crocs always run a bit on the loose side, so they're roomy, but I was expecting that.  I forgot how much I actually liked wearing them the last time they were "in style".  They stay quite comfortable on the days when I'm on my feet all day long.

I'm 7 months pregnant, and in the summer, my feet get very swollen.  I was down to 2 pair shoes that I could wear to work (closed toes shoes) and saw these on sale.  I was looking at Crocs for sometime, but was balking at the $34 price tag.  These were on sale, so I figured I might as well.  Oh, my fat feet are happy.  Good support, and they stretch with my feet throughout the day, so no pinching.  They do seem to shrink overnight, because they don't seem overly large the next day.  Obviously not very fashionable, but I was not looking for fashion, just shoes I could wear in semi-comfort.  I usually wear a 7.5/8 women's, and ordered these in a women's 8, which are fitting well.

These were made in Mexico.  the pair I was replacing is made in China.  The size and feel is totally different.  The made in Mexico crocs were shorter, more narrow, and slippery on the inside.  I had to return them immediately.  Will have to buy them in a store.

I love these crocs.  This is the first pair I've owned.  They are very comfortable.  You need to be aware that they run large so you should buy a size smaller than your usual shoe size.  I usually wear a woman's 9.5 or 10.  I bought a woman's size 9 and they fit perfectly.

I love them! Get them dirty, spray off with hose, then wipe some cleaner on them and they look brand new very comfortable and easy to just slip on. Loved them so much had my dad buy a pair and he says they are as comfortable as slippers.

I think if you wear a half size order up for sure. I wear a 6 and it was a true size 6 for me. I do have some room left but if I wore socks my toes would have just enough room! I love them! They are so comfy and cute!

I have a knee problem and have found that Crocs greatly reduce the pain because of they cushion my steps.  I use one pair for house shoes and another pair for outdoor gardening work.  Has been a great help for my bad knee.

We love crocs. My son wears a 4/6 and we needed a replacement pair due to a broken strap. I ordered a 4/6, but for some reason, the shoes are actually visibly smaller than his current 4/6's. They appear approximately 1/2 inch smaller. I will save them for my younger son to grow into, but they are too small for my son who fits his other 4/6 crocs.
I love my crocs.  SO Handy, waterproof and not slippery.  I can walk on water now.  Good product, good vendor, good transaction.

Ok, so I bought bright yellow crocs for three reasons. One, I was getting yelled at by my wife for walking around the kitchen barefoot while cooking. Two, I wanted something simple, durable, and comfy. Three, I wanted these to be so loud that I'd never wear them out of the house. Mission accomplished. Comfy as hell, my feet don't sweat in them, and I am self-conscious enough about them to never wear them in public.
Coming back in style for kids in middle and high school I guess? Lmao 🤷🏻‍♂️

I love these crocs. My old pair mysteriously dissappeared in the OR changing room at work. Apparently I'm not the only one who likes them ;) After a couple weeks without them turning up, I bought new ones. They fit great and don't hurt my feet.
I have worn crocs for years. I have heel spurs. I was unable to work because I could not stand . With the crocs I was able to work . I am retired now but I still love my crocs!
As advertised - 10 is a 10. Not smaller than or larger than 10 - perfect fit
...but I love them!
Love them! Perfect for my husband to get on and off by himself after recent hip surgery.

These are my first pair of Crocs and certainly not my last. Super comfortable and easy to slide on and off. I’m running around all the time from work and school so it’s nice to give my feet a break sometimes with nice, lightweight shoes

thank goodness for Crocs!  Husband had severe heel pressure/pain several years ago, purchased Crocs through Amazon and he's been living in them every since - no more pain/discomfort. Amazing footwear!! We replace them every 2-3 years to keep support working!
Fits true to size (snugly) could have gotten 1 size bigger and been ok.

HUGE CROC FAN OVER HERE! With these added to my collection I’m up to 6 pairs. They might not be the prettiest shoes but they sure are the comfiest! I can wear these for hours upon hours and still be totally comfortable.

These were ordered for my sister who wears them constantly around the house. She is replacing a pair she has had for 7 years. She loves Crocs and finds them comfortable for her, although they do not provide the sort of support an oxford would. Great casual shoes if you do not have foot problems.
The rivet on the back strap broke the first time my granddaughter put them on and now the product is UNWEARABLE. VERY disappointed in this product.  I would certainly like someone to make this right.
Great color for poking around the yard.  It helps as this is the second pair but it is consistent with normal street shoe sizes.
My daughter had crocs when she was 5. She's 14 and wanted them again.these are great! She loves tjem

I like Crocs, but I wear them because my podiatrist told me they'd be better for me, after the plantar fasciitis.  I can usually wear them with the thicker socks.  They do make my feet sweat, so I take them off from time to time, and if my socks are too wet I remove them, too, and find a dry pair.  Not so bad in the summer, but it can be chilly in the winter.
These crocs are great except they are too narrow for my wide foot. I bought classics made

Was looking for a pair of crocs that felt like the worn out pair I've been wearing for the last ten years (?).  Went to a shoe store and they all felt too hard and stiff, and not soft and cushy like my old pair.  So after an exhaustive search at Amazon trying to find the same style, I finally found these and they were exactly what I was looking for -- old school croc cushiness, nice and easy on the soles of my feet.
I wore the last pair so much, the tread wore off, so time for a new pair, exactly the same.

I recently started at a job where I have to be on my feet from 4-8 hrs and mostly standing in on place. My feet and body were killing me until I remember talking to some nurses when my son was in the hospital. Most of the nurses wore them and swore by them. I ordered a pair and love them! They do feel a little wide. I wouldn't want them shorter but narrower would be good. My feet feel so much better. I plan to order more in different colors

these are crocs, arch support wasn't needed, they fit right, feel good, look good and the price was right. my size limits the availability and style selection but I'm happy.  got what I ordered and they arrived as expected. may not need another pair for a while but when I do I will order from Amazon, good products good service and good prices. Thanks, Robert.

I followed a suggestion in a review that informed others that Crocs often run a tad larger than normal shoe size. I bought these for my husband, who usually wears size 10.5.  There are no half sizes, so I wasn't sure which way to go.  Wound up buying the size 10, and indeed, the shoe fits! Very relieved. My husband loves them.

These were not Crocs. They were in a bag that said Crocs, which we were happy to see, given the price charged, but we didn't notice that the brand name was Satihu on the shoes until after we tossed the packaging (arrived on garbage day, unfortunately). Trying to return them at that point would have been more trouble than it was worth. Be aware you may get knock offs and not Crocs before you do what we did.
Much better price then at the store.  These are great and I wear em out quick.  Love a new pair

Just a little too big.  The only thing I don't like about crocs is the size you need depends on the style.  I ordered the same size as other crocs I have but these are bigger.  I guess you really should to go through croc's website to check they're information on sizing of a particular style and then order where ever you want.  These will fit great with socks, but are loose without.  For wet summer weather, I guess I'll just slosh around a bit.  Love the color of these blue crocs, almost matches jeans exactly.
Love these crocs.  This 67 year old wears them all the time. Wash well in the washer.  I let them air dry.

I have mostly only worn Crocs Clogs since early 2009 as a result of a medical condition.  I can easily put these on and they're fairly comfortable.  I'm not sure why, but there have been different sizing schemes over the years ranging from XL, Men's 10-11, and Men's 11.  I have many colors and will continue to use them.  I feel like they're expensive, but they're worth it.

I have a different pair of Crocs that are softer and more comfortable. Same size. These are stiff and if the strap is in the back, my foot is jammed to the toe. Not sure if they need breaking in or returning. Like the color though.
Same as always. They work
5/5 would buy again.
Ordered navy blue and got a brick red colored pair. Have to return.
My son is usually wearing size 10.5 / 11 but I guess this company is making them a little bigger. But overall, this brand is great!

I work in a hospital and these are great and comfortable. The best thing is that my feet breathe and don't get smelly like a canvas or leather lace up or even slip on do. I have a box full of other canvas/leather lace ups that degrade inside over time as well as slip on famous brands that have now become my garden shoes as I can't wear them anymore for daily work as they wore out. Another thing is that you can wash crocs and these don't lose shape or fall apart inside.
I wished they would have other colors for better price, I have been wearing crocks for ever, as long as on the market, now difficult to find and quite expensive
Great price, good fit, quick and on time shipping...just what my son was looking for.
My old ones literally wore out. These fit fine and I am happy with them.

Bought these for my pregnant wife. She normally wears an 8 but I got her a 9 only because I know she was going to be wearing these with socks from time to time and/or her feet were going to swell. Definitely glad that I did

I have a WIDE foot with a HIGH arch & a terrible time finding shoes to fit.  I've worn these constantly for the past 3-4 years except for church & it was time for a new pair.  Haven't quite worn thru the sole, but I was starting to feel rocky ground.  My sister & I both wear the same style.  She is on her feet all day on cement & says it's like walking on a gel mat all day.  Great to find it at such a good price.

These fit just right. They are lasting me a long time as I have to go to class and walk a lot, so I am happy at how comfortable and flexible they are on my feet. I can just slip on and go. Not too constricting or tight so just to put it simple, not too bad!

Way too narrow. Plus the dimples in the bottom make me feel like I have pebbles in the show. Arch doesn't even come close to allowing comfortable wearing. I even ordered a size larger to compensate for my crazy feet. Maybe after the swelling goes down a bit they will fit better. But right now. Not so good.
Fits perfect. Great for walking on hard floors. Best thing I ever purchased for my mother
Love these! So roomy. Use them for shower slippers, and to wear around the house. Great, so far!
Just about the only shoe I've worn all summer! <True
Came promptly and are what we wanted/expected! Love the lavender.
The narrative says if you are between sizes to size down.  I did and the fit was way too short.  I'm an 8.5 so I ordered the 8.  I gave them to my sister who is a 7.5 and they were STILL too small
Soft. Hold up well. Ugly, so you won't be tempted to take them out into the world. Perfect inside-only shoe.
My daughter wanted these for Christmas. They fit as expected and are cute.
The spikes in the shoes sole are too "spiky"/sharp edge. They hurt your feet unless you wear thick socks. Very disappointed.

This is my second pair that one shoe shrunk but the other shoe did not. You can visibly see that one shoe is now shorter than the other and is too small to wear. They are hardly worn and were not put in the dryer.
These Crocs were bought as a gift for my grandson.  He just sent me a text and he is wearing them and likes them a lot.
Crocs have been my go-to shoes for about 10 years, but most of the ones I have are pretty dull looking. Needed something to dress up with and these bright lemon colored shoes are just perfect

My daughter loves her Crocs!! She's on her feet 12+ hours per day where she works as an RN at a local hospital. She swears by the comfort level. Sure her dogs are barkin' at the end of the day, but not nearly as bad as when she used to wear sneakers.
Bought these to replace a tired pair.  The color is brighter than the old pink, but may fade with washings.

Very orange but when you're wearing Crocs does it really matter?! Dr told me to get them to help with plantar fasciitis flare ups for long barefoot stints in the kitchen on the hardwood floors. They really do seem to help with the pain-not my popularity with the teenagers though. ;) I'm glad I purchased them

I love my crocs, have several pairs in various styles, wear them every day. I know they're not the most stylish shoes walking down the block, but they are, by far, the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn! My feet and my back never tire when I wear them, not even after a whole day! I walked  all over Europe's uneven, stone streets in them, and they were perfect. All I did was throw them in the shower with me in the evening, and they were ready to go the next morning. I only wish they'd bring back the Nile sandal and the original Mary Janes.
I purchased these for camp shoes, and fording streams while backpacking. They're the correct size, but the width is way too big. Event with the heel strap they won't stay on my feet.

Love my Croc's. I wear them whenever weather permits.  Super comfortable too.  Great for casual and lazy person like myself.  I had a pair of knockoffs before this, these are built and feel much better.  I'll always own a pair til I can't walk.
I ordered according to the size chart for my daughter who is a 9 in women’s

Well, we say we are a Crocs only household because we all have them and love them. They’re comfortable and pretty much use them as slippers in the house, for the pool, the beach, making a quick run to the supermarket and definitely at the Disney parks! This pair is for a friend who stays over a few times a month... He needed crocs lol

Hey buyers. Beware of this particular link. Crocs are amazing, but these are the "Roomy" edition, which are too wide for most feet, and two sizes up from the Crocs you buy in most stores. The fit is widely different than the regular fit. If you've never worn a Croc, you wouldn't know. They should make this abundantly clear rather.
Arrived on time, extremely comfortable, fits well, definitely a deal .
My daughter loved them! I also purchased a 100pk of jibbitz characters she thought were perfect!
These came with a blue line around them and the picture shows all white.

A friend of mine recommended these several years ago---and I finally took the plunge.  What a super around the house set of footwear!  No fatigue, no arch issues, and no squeezing of the foot.  I wear a wide shoe and these give me plenty of room.  I didn't expect that but am greatful.

No complaints. I would just suggest if you fall in a half size then you go to the size up. I'm a 7-7.5 and originally ordered a 7 but had to return them for an 8. Besides that they are exactly what I wanted and shipped fast.
I wear these to work (I work in water) and they are comfortable and dry quickly.
Love this shoes, I use them for gardening, very comfortable.

I bought a size 9 (women) since I wear a 9 in a sandal.  I wear a 9.5 in a closed toe shoe.  But there was a recommendation in this description that half sizes should order down.  So I thought a size 9 would be just right for me.  Alas, they are too short.  The end of my toes touches the front of the shoe even without a sock.  So I immediately had to put them back in the box and return them.  According to my experience, one would order a size up, not a size down.  A 9 is too short for a 9.5 foot.  Still, they are very nice and attractive shoes, so I'm ordering a size 10.  I'm giving 5 stars because there was nothing wrong with the shoes, just bought the wrong size and don't think the description should have suggested ordering a size down.

I normally wear a size 8 1/2 and went by the recommendation to order size down on half sizes. The size 8 arrived and were very snug, I exchanged for a 9. Now I have to wait for my size 9s to arrive so I can wear them, I'm anxiously awaiting there arrival.
This was a gift for my sister, she loves them. Has had them before and this is a replacement pair.

These were perfect!! I love them and they came exactly like the picture I'm so happy. I got them as a gift for my boyfriend and they were shipped and delivered so fast and they fit him perfectly. I was scared they were gonna be too small or something but nope they fitted perfectly, in fact he even had a little toe room to spare. I would definitely order again and recommend people order from here. I'm so serious like the crocs came out perfectly. 10 outta 10 would recommend

I thought my feet wouldn't be sweaty, but oh well, they are more sweaty with these than normal boots. I guess it's because they are plastic and don't breathe. I only wear these in the office and take them off when I am sitting in my desk so it is manageable.
Too expensive. Will purchase at Kohls next time. Great product though.

My husband purchased these...he has a big foot..so he bought these crocs in size 16s...instead of his usual 25s...but he loves them..hw says they wear great...he is going to order again, just his reg..size...
My husband said they are a bit large, and wide. But overall he is happy with the purchase, and shipping.

I have been wearing Crocs for at least 8 years. I have very bad feet I walk all day on concrete and when I get home I instantly kick off my shoe and slip on my Crocs. I have bought a dozen pairs over the years. This time they seem to be smaller and not as comfortable. The material seems to be harder and slicker. I still wear them but I wish they were bigger and softer like the ones from past purchases.
Purchased these Crocs for my daughter and she loves them....In her words, "....its like walking on clouds"!

I had to return the first pair as I ordered the wrong size. If  you wear a "half size" order up to the next whole size.I also have  plantar fasciitis and purchased these to wear around  the house. Because of the pain in my heel it was suggested to me I not go barefoot ,which I love.  I needed something really comfortable and the pain in my heel has lessened considerably. I will be ordering other  styles that are a little more fashionable to wear to work.
Crocs are always the go-to shoe for dog-mess cleanup and gardening.

If you wear an 8.5 shoe buy size 9 Crocs New Crocs not like old style !!!! Plastic different also. Not as soft. I wear an 8.5 women shoe and old Crocs fit well the kind that says W 8-9. Just got size 8 new style in mail. Will have to return . Too small.

Bought them for a quick and easy light weight on/off for use in the yard and garden.  Perfect!  As for size, usually if a half size, order next size up.  Had to return the first pair because they were way too large.  Next size down are still loose, but for what I am using them for, perfect.

I wear flip flops all year around , with being a diabetic and having nerve damage on the bottom of my feet it's hard to wear shoes that don't make my feet hurt even more at times, theses Crocs are easy to put on and make my feet feel cooler, very happy with my choice of this purchase ...
I give it 4 stars because they are a little darker than on the picture.  For sure I keep them.
Very comfortable and easy to use - good alternative to sandals for quick runs out of the house.
