Well, they're Crocs. Lightweight. Nubby insole area. I think everybody knows what Crocs are. Handy to slip on when going out to the garden on a wet day.
They fit just like they should.  They're harder than my older Crocs, but all the new ones are when I went in to the Croc outlet store, so this is a good deal.
I wear a 8.5 EE and had to get a 9 to accommodate for that.The size 9 is way to large, re-ordering a side down.
They were a perfect fit. Who I was purchasing for was a 10.5 we sized up to an 11 and it fits well!
I used to wear these for work. The only drawback is when the floors are wet, watch out! This type of shoe becomes very slippery.

If you like Crocs, you will like this show.  The only tough part was working through all of the confusing shoe sizing systems!  It took about 1/2 hour to make sure that I was ordering the right thing.  Amazon should create a web page where you enter your normal US size, indicate gender, and then it will automagically tell you which Croc to buy.
I have a bad back and use these for around the house. They are very comfortable.

This is my first pair. I bought them for Guam. People were wearing these all over Panama, so I figured I'd try them. I would pay twice as much for a half size, the 11 is a bit loose which is ok for sandals i suppose. Still, five stars for the price.

These are not remotely as comfortable as originals. Went from walking on clouds to just walking on the road. Also much smaller. Another review said that (some?) Crocs made in Mexico have these problems whereas those from China do not.  Very disappointed. Returning them, will buy at a brick and mortar store to insure they are the real deal.
Great shoe, great color options, great quality! I have owned lots of crocs over the years and am always pleased with them. You will not be disappointed.

Wishing crocs came in more interesting colors for large feet (size 14+). This Blue is about it. Nice deep blue that goes well with jeans. Black and brown remind me too much of the shoes I have to wear for work! Still, great around the house shoes or run to town shoes. Very useful in summer if you live in a place where it rains. Doing a lot of kitchen work? These are perfect- like standing on one of those cushion mats you lay down on hard floors.
Came in early and were exactly what I wanted!! Real crocs, not off brand!!
These shoes were delivered fast and fit as expected. They are true to size. The color was also true too what was depicted on the website. We are pleased with our purchase.
Product is great.  Own many colors just wish they had more of the ones that were on sale available in my size!

My son (a teenager) cannot stand to think life without his Crocs! He used his last ones until the sole was almost completely smooth with wear ( three and a half years of almost non-stop use!), and until the new Crocs for "replacement" were received. I already gave up on insisting to him to wear less casual shoes for less casual ocassions (like going to a family gathering or a restaurant). Everytime I look at him, if his not barefoot, he is wearing his Crocs!
The item came in the wrong size I ordered, and now I have to go through the pain of shipping them back to the retailer. Otherwise they are a great shoe, and I would recommend them to all.

They came quickly.  The color was a brighter pink than I expected, but that's a good thing, so it was a win-win.  I'd been wanting a new pair of pink crocs but was unwilling to pay too much - the price was right and now I have my new pair!
Loved Crocs from when they first came out. Needed a clean update.
Love these! They are so comfortable. Great colors...just as shown.
Love the brand, great for gardening, quick dog walk and when dirt throw them in machine.
One of the tabs broke within 4,weeks of wearing only 3 times, but now too late to return. Very disappointed and would like an exchange or refund!
EXCELLENT POOL & BEACH SHOE, WEAR IN WATER FOR FOOT arch SUPPORT DURING WATER ACTIVITIES / EXERCISE.

Order a size or half size bigger than you normally wear. my daughter wears a 7, should have went with an 8. Other than that, great product, does what its supposed to do. Should not be used as a snow shoe or while sledding...

I have owned Crocs for many, many years and this pair replaced a pair that I had owned for some 14 years or more.  When I say wear I mean I've worn them the last 3 years daily, for work.  So, I looked forward to getting this new pair in the mail, I have them on now.  Nice color too! I have Plantar fasciitis and the cushion in the Crocs feels good on my heal.  I also have some other tender spots on my feet, (it's lovely, I know) and therefore I do love my Crocs!

I usually buy a size 9 in tennis shoes but tried these on in a store and size 9 my toes were touching end. Went with a 10. Love them. I wear instead of slippers around house. Wood floors.  More support and feet don't get all sweaty.

I wear 8 1/2 so I order a 9.  I would like to just exchange for the correct size because I got them for a good price. But now they want to do a refund and I guess they want me to reorder. Well I don't want them if I have to pay the full price. Why ask if we want an exchange or refund?
These have saved my sore pregnant feet! I went from having very painful feet every day to having little to no pain at all. I wear them at home constantly.
Wear them around the house & they're so comfortable when walking on hard floors.

You either love them or hate them. I love these ugly shoes. They are comfortable, never smell, and are so convenient. You can get them wet and they dry quickly. Socks are unnecessary. I wear a 9.5 street shoe and the 9 fits great without socks.
I didn’t believe, but now I do. I want them in every color, and I don’t care how dumb I look.
Quick ship.  These are the shoes made in Mexico!  I think they are softer for some reason and was glad to get.  My original 5 year clogs are the same product!!!!  I may order another pair soon!
Still the most comfortable footwear. 17 years in a row
My first pair.  They are very comfortable, light weight, easily stay on my feet.  I like them to use around the house but not for long (more than 1 mile) walks.
Best color! With the usual comfort and cute as all get out.(:-) Waiting for a few other colors that have been been out in my size for months. These shoes are all I wear now. I love them.
I wear Crocs most of the time. The Croc outlet store by me closed so I need to order online, even though they are way more expensive. They are the most comfortable shoes I can buy.
same as my old pair, my wifes dog loves to chew on them while I'm wearing them so they must taste good too.

I love crocks and these did not disappoint.  I have always worn an 8 and either my feet grew a little or these are a tiny bit smaller than they used to be.  My shoe size is 8.5 and I can still wear these.
Very light and comfortable, and not too loose as to fall off easily.
Great price.  Why not get on amazon instead of paying 30% more.  I wear these out I use so much so I will continue to reorder on Amazon rather than go to Shoe store.  As long as price is kept great.
sizing changed since the last time I bought crocs.  the shoes were much shorter and narrower  than the last time I bought crocs (less than 2 years ago)

These shoes are absurdly comfortable, if not visually appealing. I bought a pair two years ago, and fit into the women's size seven, but this pair felt smaller. Also, the other pair took two years to fully wear down the treads on the bottom, but I've had these for less than a year and they are beginning to wear down and lose traction. At least the price seems to be going down as the quality decreases, but I might have to start looking elsewhere for comfort shoes.
I have problems with my back and crocs are the only shoes I have that help my  back.

Just a word of warning. There are very comfortable. But they tend to run large. They only fit as expected because I bought them a size too small. Usually wear a 9 or 9.5 US, but I wear an 8 in these, and there's lots of toe room. Other than that, I couldn't be happier with them. I've also bought a pair without the holes for "formal" occasions. My wife will not let me wear them with my tux, but other than that, she's okay with them.
bought 2 pair 1 pair for house she and 1 pair for outside. A pleasant change from regular shoes and quick to change into from work boots or shoes.
I forgot crocs are huge. If you wear a men's 10 usually, you probably want an 8 in crocs unless you wear really thick socks.
Happy with my crocs. Great fit and color would buy again. My package arrived on time also. Love Amazon!

My wife makes fun of me, but i wear these every chance i get. These are hands down the most comfortable thing I have ever put on my feet. If you still laugh at the people who wear them, try a pair on... 95% chance you will stop laughing and understand why they are so popular.
It was nice to find a deal on the crocs my daughter wanted. Regular pair at a cheaper price

I have plantar fasciitis, and these are one of the very few types of shoes I can wear all day. I teach high school and I'm on my feet all day, so that's saying something! I wore my first pair until I could feel small pebbles through the soles. Now I have three functioning pairs. I LOVE these shoes, and I really don't care how they look.
Happy so far, although it can be a little clingy due to the material, which also should make it last longer. Glass is half full :-)
These fit great and the color is awesome! They are comfortable and a great option.
As usual the Crocs fit just like I wanted them to. I love these shoes, this is my 6th pair, I wear them til they are worn out. :)
I wear size 7.5 shoe. Unfortunately, Crocs do not come in half sizes. 7 was too small and 8 was too big. Sadly, there was no "just right". Was going to use these as "camp shoes".

I used to have a pair of crocs a while back but they went missing. I was out gardening and missed having a shoe like this. I forgot how comfortable and easy to slip on they are. I really enjoy how breathable yet also semi-closed toed they are. I actually quite like the super bright citrus color I ended up with (also the cheapest). Great buy!
I'm an xray tech and I wear these at work. Love crocs. I like this style because they breathe alot better. I don't work for a hospital that freaks out about holes in shoes though.
I live in crocs. These did not disappoint and were a great price.

The product itself is good, though the sizing was confusing. I typically wear 10.5-11 size shoes, but knew that these were on the wider side, so I initially ordered a men's size 10. Even the 10s were way too wide and would slip off my feet, however, so I returned them for this size 9. Now the length is a little cramped, but the width is still generous.
The original fits a little wider than the newer ones so my husband is very pleased.
Durable, comfy and washes and drys on the line well

I ordered them too large, but have been having trouble with my feet and sometimes need to wear ankle braces, so they work out well.  They're very comfortable and really do help with my foot condition (plantar fasciitis)  I am happy with the seller as well.  Received product on time and well-packaged.

I had a pair of crocs years ago, then my puppy chewed them up. I ordered these primarily for van camping, as it's nice to have a pair of shoes to slide in and out of easily. I find that I wear them as house shoes, garden shoes, after hiking shoes. I need to order a second pair! I've tried other molded plastic shoes, but the other brands are too narrow and the toe box is shallow. These are nice with socks or bare foot. So many colors to choose from!

Crocs Classics, are my favorite shoes to wear.  They are super comfortable, like walking barefoot on a soft cushion.  In cool weather I wear them with thick wool socks.  Their ease of removal and comfort make them the perfect airport shoe, like wearing slippers.  Crocs are designed to float loosely around your foot, so order a size larger than your normal shoe size.  I keep my newest pair for travel and "going out", and use my older pairs for hiking, biking, yard work, and almost every activity. If you like taking your shoes off before you come in your home, you will love Crocs step-in/step-out ease (I rarely use the fold-back heal-strap).  Think they look funny?  I agree, I'm a funny looking guy with very happy feet!
My team wears these late night at work. Super comfy. I still wish Crocs had half sizes though.

I’ve bought crocs at the retail store and on amazon. They are exactly the same. Of course the older ones have stretched out, but it’s not because they’re fake. Let’s be real- crocs will stretch out the more you wear them, people!
I ordered a pair of Crocs Classic Clog two yrs. ago. Size 12M.  Fit perfectly.
Couldn't believe my 15 yearning asked for these for his birthday, but he did.  He says they are the most comfortable things that have ever been on his feet.

bought these for my husband as a surprise. Read lots of reviews to figure out what size to get him. He usually wears an 11, but I bought a size 12 because I wanted these to be roomy and comfortable. The fit is perfect. He loves the comfort the crocs provide.
These Crocs clogs fit as expected.  Love the color too.  Very comfortable.
My daughter LOVES her Crocs. Fast shipping and nice vibrant color.  Perfect with Jibitzs.
These are perfect for walking outside in wet grass or around a pool area.
Very nice quality but I got too large a size, I use them with stocking foot waders to carry my float tube to the lake before putting on my fins. They will work
Crocs, what can you say ? Classic design and comfort. Exactly as described and arrived on time.
Ran a bit large, but fit okay with socks.  Daughter has been wearing for a few weeks now and no problems.  Very comfortable
Excellent quality, fits perfectly.

I wish they offered 1/2 sizes.  I ordered an 8 and they were too small, so gave them to a friend.  I ordered a 9 and they are a little big.  I need an 8 1/2, but no option for that.  These things are easily manufactured, with man-made materials.  There's no reason to not accommodate all normal shoe sizes.
Love Love Love this Item / Deal.
I have a 11.5 foot, so I opted for a size 12. They're a good inch or two too large.
Perfect replacement for the ones we left in the Arizona sun that deteriorated.
It was somewhat small and ready to return it but it was a perfect fit for one of my grandsons :)  So I kept it.
Product size variation - I have size 14 shoes that fit and 13s that are loose. These are way too large, unsafe.  Buyer beware: don't order on the big size of your range.
Received wrong item.
I have worn out a pair of croc yukons (the ones with the leather uppers) and replaced them. I still like them, but these all-plastics are just as comfortable and are better for wearing at the beach.
They're Crocs.......  what to say about them? They're boaty but light and will work perfectly for camp shoes on our AT section hikes.
I have never bought a bad pair of Crocs so perhaps I am biased, or at least me hoofs are anyway, but I find Crocs extremely comfortable. My feet feel good in them.
I went with half a size smaller than mine because of all the comments thata sed they were big. They fit just as the normal crocs. Loved them!

I bought these for my husband to wear tent camping.. He wore them the entire weekend, in and out of a lake, in the mud and everything. I LOVED that they just needed rinsing. He laughed when I got them for him because they're not the most stylish but DEFINITELY functional if you're doing outside things! He would have ruined his tennis shoes so it was a perfect buy. Even after a summer in the mud, they look brand new.
Surprisingly more comfortable than I expected!! Logged 7,500 steps with my first wearing. Feet weren’t aching as they typically do in athlethic shoes.
I love my crocs. I have way too much, but I can't stop buying them. I work on my feet all day and I wear this.
Roomy but fit great! Needed something to use around the house on our hardwood floors because my feet constantly hurt ALL the time! So far so good. I will update if anything changes!

These are great quality and very comfortable.  I bought these for my son because I have my own pair and wear them everywhere.  You can wear them with thick socks or bare foot.  They clean up easily with warm water and soap.  They really hold up well.  The only thing to be aware of is to not leave them sitting out in the sun.  They will shrink or warp if left to sit in the sun for a long period of time.

My feet are happy in Crocs - I wear them all year round, with socks when it's cooler. I rarely need to use the back strap, so I leave it folded forward to make them easy slip on/off.  My feet are able to breathe in Crocs so there isn't a build up of sweat to cause odor issues.  So maybe they're not so stylish but I don't care, they are comfortable which counts much more with me.

I have a problem with my arches and need to use orthotics.  I have been wearing my old crocs along with my inserts for at least 5 years or better and have always found them so comfortable.  Unfortunately they're so worn I needed to replace them.  I ordered the classic crocs and expected them to be the same as my old ones but they are different in sizing.  The boot is a little too wide and my feet move around too much so I'm not getting the support I need.  I cannot wear them for more than 1/2 hour.

I absolutely love my crocks. They have got to be the most versatile shoe out there. I can wear them to do yard work, I can use them as waders, and I can use them as comfy slippers. They're super light and they don't pick up dirt from outside.

These shoes are soooo comfortable, easy on and easy off. Can wear with nearly everything. I  love the wide range of colors. I  have purchased 4 pair for myself and 3 pair for my husband. We love them.
Always been a big fan of crocs and these didn’t disappoint

My crocs do not have a glamorous life.  They are barn and garden shoes.  They can be rinsed off easily and they do not slip on wet surfaces, well not until I have put a few years of wear on them and the soles go smooth. Yes I do clean the floor of my barn.  so they stand up to urine and feces.  When they do wear out, I buy a new pair.
Authentic croc.  Fits well. Durable for a plastic shoe.
Love the color, fits as expected and genuine Croc product.
I ordered size 15. The Crocs were marked size 15. They were at least 2 sizes to large, maybe 3 sizes to large.
I love classic crocs and these are perfect because I can get exactly what color and size I want.
Better than those knockoffs.  Apparently I'm no longer "cool" because I wear them around the house, but my feet love them.
Crocs were first made several years ago from a softer more pliable material. The ones they make now are very stiff and not near as comfortable.

I wore out a locally purchased pair that were to big but were the only ones avaible. These fir better, were cheaper, and are the only shoes I can wear for a long time since I have diabetes and must avoid tight footwear.
While these may not be the cutest shoes out there, they are super comfy. Fit true to size
Are they ugly?  Yep.
I like the crocs shoes ! Very fast shipping,  and the size was as expected
We purchased a half size larger than we wear in regular shoes because that is how our other crocs run, these were much larger than that.  He'll wear them now for the next few years.
Great Cyber Monday sale!  Great Crocs.  Comfortable.  Ships fast.

Perfect fit and extremely comfy.  This is not an easy accomplishment at my age/stage of life (very soon to be 80 years of age).  By the way, I wore these when I was 40years of age as well.  I'm a very happy camper.  Thanks to all who made this possible.

My daughter and I love these crocs. They are comfortable and easy to clean. She even wore them tubing down a river and with the adventure straps set in the back position they stayed on her feet. I even went and bought a pair for myself and my youngest daughter.

Very comfortable.  I usually take multiple sandals on vacation, but I only wore these this time.  2 weeks on the beach, shopping, pool, very comfortable.  And best of all, you can wash them and they dry quick!

Don't wait any longer....if you like these style shoes and like them just a bit roomy...this is right up your alley!  Should have purchased a pair of these years ago....will be purchasing another like this when these wear out.  Well worth the price.

I resisted buying Crocs for years because I thought they looked too "granola".  I'm a convert now as they are the most comfortable and offer great support. They are even more comfortable than my Ugg and Born clogs.
The shoes seem to fit okay, but they pinch right across the top and cause blisters on both my feet.  First pair of Crocs I ever had that did that.  It seems weird to me.
My husband is thrilled at the comfort of these shoes which slip on easily and do not pinch his feet anywhere.
Like color and wearability. Easy to fit into. Feels comfortable.
Nice pair of crocs.  Easy to slip on when you don't feel like putting on and tying up a pair of standard shoes.  Nice in the summer.

My niece loves the color and they fit as expected. However, it took almost three weeks for them to be delivered. It was the holiday season, so I understand it takes longer for things to ship, but I was worried they wouldn’t arrive in time for Christmas.
I cannot go barefoot so I keep crocs around for the shower.  Don't have to worry about slipping on a wet floor and they can stay right in the bathroom.
Exactly what I expected. Looking forward to Spring to wear them.
Works for a quick slip-on for taking the dog outside. Easy to clean if you mistakenly step in something left behind by another dog in the dark (because yours would never do that to you).
I've owned several pairs of these and they are durable, comfortable and convenient. There are not stylish but they make up for it in practicality.
I still think they look goofy but dang it are these comfy
Great product, my girls and I have ordered 3 pair. Love these & Fast Shipping!
My husband loves these clogs since they are comfortable and last long, the color is great and easy to combine with dress-down clothing. Recommend this purchase.
Real Crocks! Comfortable and cushioning. Well made. The real deal.
I love the color and the fit, very comfortable
Both HS daughter wear them, many colors.  We love Crocs!
These are great clogs that will work in almost all situations. Very comfortable with a slight pinching in the ball and toe areas.

I have several pairs of these and love the comfort they give.  I started wearing them more often when I was flying so it was easier tor remove my shoes at the airport.  I wanted a slip on and these fit the bill.  I have not had the sizing/fit issues others have expressed in their reviews.  thanks for the great fit and great purchase.

Purchased for my daughter and she absolutely loves them! She wears these shoes everyday, they fit perfectly, and arrived very quickly after purchasing. Great price, smooth transaction, highly recommend this seller and product.
Who doesn’t love Crocs? These fit perfect are were true to size.

My wife loves these for comfort but beware if you have a narrow foot-- if you size down they are roomy on the sides, but toes are touching the end. She is in between sizes (6.5) and got the size 6. She is keeping them because the next size up will be too big.

I used to sell shoes. A poor-fitting pair of shoes can ruin your day, while a great pair can allow you to walk around town all day. Everyone's feet are different, so for me these are just great. It's all about the fit. these are my "house" shoes and I probably walk two or three miles a day in the house doing chores. These are more comfortable, because of the slight cushioning, then walking around in sox.
What's not to love about a crock? My husband loved these for the beach - great for yard work and knocking around the house with a closed toe!! (Instead of a flip flop)
Great for around the house. Wouldn't be caught dead wearing them out in public.
Our daughter wanted these to wear when she goes to her indoor swim meets.  She likes that they are easy to put on and her toes are enclosed.
Finally had to replace my original pair after wearing the soles off of them.  Yep they're ugly, but they are so comfortable and great to wear around the house daily.
Too comfortable to look sexy. Great shoes for both in and out doors.

I bought these because they looked like the same style as a camo pair I've had for a while that I love. They are in fact the same and I love the fit and comfort. I'm returning them because I decided I don't like the white, but I'll reorder a different color.
Good fit, comfortable shoes. Reasonable price.

I like the crocs but they're too big on me. I ordered a 6 US Men / 8 US Women and I wear an 8 in women's tennis shoes. They were definitely too big and I should have ordered a size down. Also they're very wide as they're unisex.

Be careful.  If you get the wrong size and send it back, you may get your replacement from another place and have the shoe fit differently.  Gave up after the 2nd return.  Two pairs of the same size may not fit the same.  Might want to try these on in a store.

I have many PAIR of Crocs!!! I personally love them. But this particular pair were purchased for my sister that had a melanoma tumor removed from her foot. She needed something comfortable without being restrictive. It had to fit over her face bandage and give her support.
Teenager loves!  Order one size up.  Color true to picture
Ugh... I wanted to hate crocs because they are so ugly but these are seriously little hugs for your feet. I still refuse to wear them in public... but I wish I had them in every color.
I’m so disappointed that crocs become adult sizes after size 3.  It makes it tricky to get kids crocs because they are really wide.

Got these for my husband. He wears a 10 1/2 or 11.  He had a pair of size 9 that were a pinch too small but he wore them out.  Decided to try the next size up.  He just received them so it is a bit early to tell but he thinks these will work better.  Too bad you do not have 1/2 sizes.

I was disappointed with these crocs. I have bought them on Amazon before, but those actually fit me. These were too small, they seemed at least one size too small. I tend to round up a size with crocs anyway because they often run a little small. I compared these to a pair of size 10 crocs I already own, and they were significantly shorter in length. I was very unhappy with this purchase. From now on, I will now be buying my crocs in store, not online.

Ok let's face it Crocs like these are ugly on anyone over 10. But they are great for slipping on to run outside and/or walk through muck. It's  a good thing that's what I bought them for. As a fashion statement they get -5 stars but as yard work shoes they get 4 stars, sorry just can't give 5 stars to shoes  this ugly even if they are pink. Lol!!
Not my favorite look but very comfortable and a great alternative to slippers in the house. Going to order in other colors.
my new favorite shoes, surprisingly comfortable when I wear them for an extended period
I know she'll like them because they are exactly what she asked for.
Exactly as expected! Might not be fashion-forward, but they are comfy!

These are my "go-to" shoes for everything from bedroom slippers to hopping in the car for a quick errand. My feet are short and wide and the 7 is perfect (not too big or "sloppy" but enough width for comfort.) The craze for this style has run its course but I have always adopted comfort over fashion. Good purchase.
6 months later and broke them, bought another pair and still have them wear daily and nice for the feet.

My husband has no arch at all and super wide feet. He doesn’t like flip flops but needed a quick easy shoe to wear in and out of the water with our boat. I love my crocs and sure enough he loves his new crocs! They are super comfy and fit well for our wide feet! They might not be the sexiest or cutest choice but they are pure comfy :)

These looked like Crocs made several years ago (replacing a worn-out set).  Shoes ended up too small even though size imprinted on soles matched earlier set.  Heel strap seemed to be too small, wasting about 3/4" of foot-space if you wanted to use it.  Shoe size itself was also too small.  Returned this item -- will shop locally for all footwear in the future.
These are 1/2" shorter than the two same-size pairs they have replaced.  Also the material is stiffer and feels more like plastic than the older squishy rubbery material

These are not only very comfortable, come in lots of colors for guys and gals, and are durable and fit just right.  The price I got mine for was good too, thank you Amazon, and the shipping was free.  Being a prime member has paid for itself 20 times over for me.  This product may not be super stylish but they sure are functional.  Waterproof, fit well, and fairly priced, as well as easy on your feet make them a great buy.
Good deal and it fits perfect and they are comfatable
Everyone mocks Crocs.  They're ugly, they say.  They look dumb, they say.

I left these outside for a few hours in the sun and they shrunk permanently. They're now too small for my husband to wear. I've never heard of Crocs doing that so I'm left wondering if these are an imitation.
Bought these as a replacement for the identical item because they shrunk (FYI- don't put them in the dishwasher! It gets them clean all right, but they shrunk about 2 sizes) Great shoes
They run large. I normally take a men's size 8 or 8.5 but I had to go down to a 7 for a good fit.  But other than the sizing puzzle, they are the most comfortable thing I have ever had on my feet.
Light weight but comfortable slip on clog made of rubber
Love my Crocs!  They may be a wee bit large, but not so much the my feet slide around.  Wearing a 9.5, I'm used to having to choose a wee bit small or a wee bit large.
Got them to replace my other pair that I've had for 10 years, nothing wrong with them, just looking a bit worn.  Very comfortable!
I wear the crocs around the house and in Lieu of bedroom slippers.

Fit as expected.  Daughter loved them.  She wears them often and they seem to be holding up very well. Quality is good and she says they are very comfortable. 4 stars instead of 5 because they are pretty hard to keep clean.
Perfect for everyday life here in Hawaii!
These were for my Granddaughter at Christmas and they fit perfectly. She loves them.
I love crocs.  I wear them almost every day.  My feet NEVER get tired.

I expected they would be slightly large, they are, but they are still comfortable.  They could be worn with socks, which I prefer when wearing them to garden.  These were made in Mexico and do not seem to have any of the problems mentioned in other reviews.  The straps are both the same length and they feel very cushiony.  The color is vibrant, which is what I wanted.
Took me a couple tries to get right size.  Love them now.

Crocs are wonderful! They really help me deal with arthritic ankles and hips. They are a bit unattractive, but comfort is my important quality. If I have to attend a formal event (as if) my  shoes will be bedazzled Crocs!! Love them.
I always buy the same size in my crocs and these were just a tad too small
I am a big time croc lover of all colors and styles. These crocs truly finish my collection. I love the black it is so snazzy and somewhat sexy! Definitely recommend
I love them, they are soft comfy and have a nice thick durable sole
The shipment was on time from the seller! Crocs are crocs you either love them or hate them!

My old crocs were unisex also with a mans size and womens size printed on the bottom of them. Since the womens size was out of stock at Amazon I decided to order the men's size. It's a bit small, can't wear socks with them but ok for in the house as a slipper. Next time I'll know better.

Bought  these for my husband he's very happy with them however he is a half size I went down like rocks recommended and he finds them a little small but not so small that he can't wear them very happy they were in great shape.
Nothing quite as comfortable for those with ankle and knee problems. We wear them around the house and garden every day!
I use theses fir my yard shoes and I love them. They stay on even when kneeling, are easy to clean, allow my feet to breathe, and are very low impact. Plus the pink is pretty.

It's so hard to find shoes to fit my husband's 16.5 eeeeee foot. Almost to my delight, these run a little big (still room to grow!. The vendor was very accommodating with refunding a pair that was a size too big. We ordered the next size down and my conservative, stodgy fashion sense husband loves them for easy slip on and wear around the homestead shoes! Plus they still have a little room lengthwise... Nothing to do with the vendor, just wish Croc had a pair of these that are enclosed for rainy days!
Great for my son. Fits perfect. He loves these shoes.

These fit just slightly larger than the black and the brown ones. I have peripheral neuropathy and change shoes often in a day. This style is the best. It offers arch support and comfort. Great for after a long day.
These are so lightweight and comfy! More support than I was expecting! You can definitely tell the difference between these and kick-offs!

For the last 5 years these are the only shoes that I have been able to wear.  I get hot very easily, even in the winter.  But I need a shoe with good cushioning to help with my joint pain.  My only complaint would be that it is getting hard to find the Croc Classic in very many colors. In the past they were available in a rainbow of colors, but now I have to settle for navy, black, and khaki.  Btw, these are the shoes that used to be known as Cayman Crocs.  Please Croc bring back the rainbow!
I LOVE my Crocs.  The first  pair was too small, they sent me next size and GREAT to deal with.  This pair is perfect, but Crocs DO stretch, so be aware.
Love these! I am going to use these as my house slippers. We have tile and it will provide some support and will help my feet from hurting.
Worn almost every day since they arrived

This was my first pair of Crocs and i absolutely love them. They were a little wider than I thought they would be, but that's not a problem for me. For anyone deciding on whether or not to buy themselves a pair, I say go for it! They are comfortable, and to be honest, I sometimes forget that I'm wearing them.
Be prepared for painful corns on both side of your feet where plastic connectors are.
I have been wearing these almost every day.  Comfortable to walk in too!
Love my Crocs, have them in many color.

Fits perfect without the heel strap on. If you plan on wearing the heel strap a lot then I would size up. Otherwise, this was a great buy compared to the crocs website. Love the color and they have lasted through so much! Also super easy to clean.

I have been wearing Crocs as slippers for at least 15 years- very comfortable all day on hardwood floors. I have purchased about 10 pairs over that time. This is the best-fitting pair yet. I wear a size 8 normally and this pair is true to fit. I have bought Crocs manufactured in China, Canada, Mexico and even the US (I think, a long time ago). The ones from Mexico have seemed to have the best fit. The color is actually slightly darker than the illustration - not quite such a "highlighter pink" color. I prefer the slightly darker shade.

I wear a size 10 in most mens shoes, but a size 9 in Crocs fits me perfectly; so the fit is "as expected", but not accurate to normal US shoe sizing.  I love these things; this is my second pair, and I wore my first pair until the bottom was bald and one of the straps came off on one side.  Figured I should pony up for a new pair.

I love these shoes, totally didn't expect them to be so useful and comfortable.  They are even too large in all dimensions but that doesn't seem to matter.  I use them all around the house since they slip on so easy and can be rinsed off.  Super light weight and super soft material.  Great product.
I like These shoes for standing on hard surfaces like tile
The crocs are perfect, in fit comfort.
LOVE these! I never thought that I would own a pair of Crocs but for what I do for work they are great since I can easily slip them on and off.

I like the color (Citrus) and the fit of my new Crocs.  I'm unable to fit comfortably into casual wear shoes or dress shoes because I have sciatic nerve problems and am unable to bend far enough to put on socks on my right foot and shoes too.  If it weren't for these Crocs, I'd have to walk around barefoot.

Besides purple being my favorite color, this pair of crocs fits better than the pair I got about 10 years ago (I still have and wear them). They are comfortable to wear for an extended period of time too.
Both pairs of CROCS fit perfectly and the cost was very reasonable.
I exchanged this for the next larger size because it was too small. Other than that, delivered quickly and perfect.
I've owned several pairs of these.  They are comfortable, cool and provide good support. At least until they begin to wear out.  And the soles on these are pretty soft so they wear out fast.
Ugly
Typically wear a size 14 in shoes, these came in and I was swimming in them. Should have ordered a size down.
Everyone wrote that they run small and only come in whole sizes. I usually wear 9.5s, so I ordered a pair of 10s. They definitely don't fit at all, and are far too large.

I work in the medical field, and normally wear danskos to work. Wanted to see if I could get something a little less hot for summer, so I gave these a try. I'm so glad I did, they are SOOO comfy! I would not wear them without socks, feel like that would end up pretty smelly after a few times wearing them like that. My favorite part of these are the ventilation holes - the AC in the car can actually cool my feet after a long day! I live in Phoenix, so that is actually a really big deal - I used to take my shoes off for the drive home to keep them from getting so hot, and you really aren't supposed to drive barefoot! The squishy foam is quite comfortable as well. Some flooring materials (laminate specifically) will make these squeak when walking, but not much different from my danskos honestly. They are totally silent on tile and linoleum. Wish I had bought these years ago for summers!
Might not match everyone's idea of fashion, but I swear by their comfort!
I’m just so happy to finally have some lounge shoes that actually fit!

I had ordered Crocs directly from the supplier and was very unhappy when my normal size did not fit at all.  I ordered this paid a size larger than normal and they fit perfectly.  So glad to take advantage of the free shipping both ways as I knew I wouldn't be stuck with shipping fees.  I love Crocs!  They are the perfect shoe for me to wear in my garden and around the house.
Like the shoes, but one of the straps is upside down.
Fits surprisingly well! Just got the shoes and no problems so far.
Shrunk. Too tight.
Bottom of shoe is somewhat sticky but overall very durable and good quality
My daughter (16) loves these and swears they’re back in style, at least around DC.
These are smaller than the same ordered size from several years ago. Still not too small as the others were initially larger than I had expected. Now I simply can't wear with socks.

I got these as a gift for my husband who wears a Men's 14 4E shoe.  They fit perfectly and he is delighted.  He wears them out to the pool and for quick trips outside as they are so handy to just slide into.  They arrived on time as well so I would recommend this vendor.
My husband wanted these for garden work, & he's totally happy. They are a unisex style, but the fit for him was just right. The holes are nice for giving some air & for shedding water.
I seriously think these are the ugliest shoes ever, but my 14 year old had to have them and she wears them all the time! She even wears the charms in them like a toddler!
They are crocs if you like them you like them. Super comfortable and convenient for going outside quickly.
I am wearing the Crocs right now as I am typing. The size I picked fits great. It is hard to find Crocs in stores. I considered myself lucky to find them on Amazon. I wear them all the time.

I ordered these for my daughter. She normally wears an 8.5 women so I order a size 9 women. It was too large for her foot. A Womens 8 in Crocs fits her much better and these size 9 crocs fit me. I normally wear a Womens size 10.
Very comfortable. I bought these to wear when a foot injury made my other shoes impossible to wear due to swelling, and they helped a lot when I had to do a lot of walking at work on an injured foot.
Girt for hubby-he loves them
Soy 7.5 y los ordene 8 y me quedaron super bien. Me encantan
Cant ever go wrong with crocs. Comfortable and can get wet and not get ruined awesome. Glad to be able to purchase on amazon prime
Shoes fit perfectly based on your measurements.  So comfortable as house shoes.  Colors great and price excellent.  Thanks!
I love the comfort. I wear them all the time. There's plenty of room in the toe. My only problem is sweaty feet. Even with all the holes. I have to wear good socks. And they are easy to clean.
Excellent, Super Fast Delivery, Exactly as Described Perfect Thank You Sally
These fit large, I wear them just about every day around the house and even out, they are very comfortable, have to wear footies sometimes when it's warm because your feet will sweat.
They are a wee bit too big but I don't mind as long as the back strap keeps them on. I like them big so it feels as if I'm walking barefoot. Anyway, now I know what size I shall get the next pair!
I love wearing these around the house. I'm a size 9 1/2. They are a little big and wide, but I like them.
Perfect fit. Just as expected. Loved Them.
My granddaughter loves her yellow crocs

I normally wear a size 6 in women which is a size 4 in men. I read the reviews and got so confused, because some say order one size up and others say the opposite. However I ordered one size up (W7, M5) thinking that if they're big, that's fine, BUT THEY FIT PERFECTLY!!! I think if you have small feet which is under size 9, you should order a size up.

Bought for the sole purpose of crossing a snow covered deck to get into the hot tub and they are perfect for that.  I wear them into the tub and then let them float up and put them aside.  When I'm ready to get out, I put them on in the water and wear them back into the house.  For the short times I wear them, they are incredibly comfortable.
Back strap broke off within a week of purchasing.  My husband was not thrilled.

I had a pair of croc sandals a few years back and they were very comfortable.  I wore them frequently.  I wanted something I could wear around the house during the cold weather. I don't like wearing shoes or sneakers when I'm inside and slippers cause my feet to get too hot - not very supportive either.  So remembering my comfortable croc sandals I decided to try a clog.  I'm so glad that I did.  I can wear them w/or without socks and they are very comfortable.  I have happy feet and that makes me very happy!
Great fit, I wear a size ten and these fit perfectly. They are comfortable, easy to clean and easy to get on and off. Just the thing for yard work and other messy chores. Great for the beach too.
Perfect fit my hubby loves them ! Fast delivery ! A+++++

I love the vibrant purple color, but I could use a little bit more room for my toes. The crocs are fine if I just slip them on, which is what I do most of the time. However, if I want to use the heel strap, I'll be hard pressed for comfort.

When I ordered these Crocs, I used the comments people had posted for getting the correct size.  I went the next size down because people were saying they were too big.  Sometimes it's a hit or miss with Crocs.  A blue pair I had purchased in a store were great.  I tried the same size in a black and they were too small.  Had to get a size up.  I can't understand why this happens.  Quality Control?
Great ones, feels good, thanks!
This was a gift for my son’s girlfriend and it was perfect. She loves Crocs and yellow is her favorite color, so these were perfect
Buy a size down. I wear 9.5 in men's sneakers, but 10 in Crocs was too large. 9 is just right for me.

Great slip-on shoes. They are Crocs, so they are wide and easy to slip on to run out to the garden or mailbox quick. Have also worn them all-day as slippers with no issues. Great for yard work when the lawn is wet. Yes your feet get wet, but plastic Crocs dry a lot faster than canvas shoes.

It took me a long time to embrace Crocs clogs. I mean they are about the ugliest footwear I have ever seen, but once I tried a pair I was completely sold on them. They are, bar none the most comfortable shoe I have ever put on - the only thing better is being barefoot and who wants to do that inside stores and restaurants. The order came quickly which was great because I was going on a trip and these are the best shoes to wear for plane travel since they are easy to take off for security.
too small but that’s really on me, i should’ve ordered a 9 instead of an 8. but they did come bent up and i thought it would go away eventually but still hasn’t..
My daughter loves these. Color is great. She wears them almost every day and they still look pretty new.

As with most flip-flops, for Crocs, women need to go a 1/2 size - 1 size down. I wear between a 7.5 and 8. I should have ordered a 7 and they would have fit fine. Would have done a quasi-even exchange -- another color, women's size 7. The orange is not as pictured. Kind of garish.
I bought these because I have plantar fasciitis and my doctor recommended them.  I love the fit and the cushiness, and they are helping me reduce the inflammation in my heel.
Fits and feels very comfortable. Perfect for garage or backyard use.
I usually wear a Size 9 in Men's shoes, so I ordered a size 8. I wear size 7/8 flip flops(Men's)
These are amazing. I can be comfortable and stylish at the same time. 10/10 Would recommend.
Bought as a Christmas present for my friend, and she wears them everyday! She says they’re very comfortable!
Purchased as a gift for a grandson.  He loves them and wears them constantly.  As usual, Crocs are a little pricey, but they seem to last forever.

I purchased these Crocs for my children.  They love just quickly slipping on these comfortable crocs when we have to go somewhere.  It is also great to wear at spray parks.  In my opinion, I think crocs look cuter on little kids than big kids.  Some of my kids are older and they still like to wear them.

I go stocking-footed in the house most of the time, and needed something that I could slip into quickly when I wanted to go outside.  These clogs are great!  They are comfortable (I have bunions and need extra space), and well-made.  I don't feel the gravel underfoot in these Crocs, like I have with similar knock-off clogs.  White is not the best color for clumping around in a farm lot, but they are easy to clean with cleanser.
I am converted to crocs, cool and waterproof.
These are my lovely gardening shoes. My husband does not approve when I leave the house in them.
These fit perfectly! They are very comfortable.
I wear a size 8 and these fit perfect.  Very comfortable and lightweight.  Wouldn't hesitate ordering again. Excellent value.
Good quality but feels bumpy in places on the bottom of my foot

I love Crocs, but the plastic piece that holds the strap on broke after 4 months. It didn't just come unattached, but the actual plastic broke.  If it's only going to last four months, I could have bought the cheap off-brand...

These  shoes are perfect!  They are very comfortable and fit just right.  I love the many selections of colors they have to choose from.  You can't go wrong when ordering them.  An AA Plus! Be blessed,
Comfortable with reasonable arch support.
If you don’t own a pair of hot pink crocs you’re not living
Love these...wore my last one for years till falling apart...theyre both comfortable & durable

I am very disappointed in this particular pair of Crocs. The right shoe fits perfectly.  The strap on the left shoe is shorter than that on the right and rubs my heel.  I will need to return them and hope that the quality-control on the next pair is better.  I wear my Crocs in the house every day.
Love crocs. I like to wear them year round.  These fit good.

Crocs are my favorite go to shoes for myself and the kids. I love the white because they match most outfits. Also, the school requires closed toe shoes with a strap behind the heel so they meet the requirements. I am very pleased with this purchase. Prime shipping in two days came in handy. :)
These were for my 12 year old granddaughter and they were a little small on her.  Her foot is 9" from toe to heal and the size 6 said that would work.

I ordered these red crocs for a Christmas gift.  I couldn’t find red ones in stores anywhere! I got these on sale and they arrived super fast! She was definitely happy to receive these :) They fit great and are true to color!

On the left shoe the strap is super long and doesn’t sit right on the top of the croc. I like to wear them with the straps resting on the front so this disappoints me as it doesn’t sit right at all. I have one other pair of clogs and the strap sits perfectly fine. Don’t know what happened with these. Pretty upset.
I'm a size 11 shoe and even the size 10 were too big. Otherwise, good.
as expected. good product to wear in and out of the house. doesn't get dirty easily either.
Comfortable.  Use as slippers.

Love these for traveling from the gym/pool home. Work with my crazy orthopedic socks too. Wish they weren't so ugly. I would wear them all the time. Watch new puppies with them. My dog carries them everywhere
Love it for easy trips to get the paper or working in the yard

These are absolutely the most comfortable things on my feet.  I got them because I have planters fasciitis and I needed to have a "slipper" with more support, and these fit the bill perfectly!  Highly recommend them.
These are the same style crocs I have worn and loved for years and I ordered the same size as my others but these are at least two sizes smaller.

This Men's 9 - Women's 11 is fully two inches shorter than the other two pairs of size 9 Crocs my husband wears. No way they will fit him. What the heck? They went straight back to Amazon. Really bummed out.
Crocs was nice but notice the damage n marks..like someone has worn it..
I really like the color. It is definitely wider - it is unisex. To wide for my foot. I will only buy women’s in the future.

I bought these for my son who loves them. I've worn Crocks Classics for years, and love their convenience, breathe-ability, and cleanse-ability. They are great gardening or on-the-run shoes that give support and protection, but can be tossed about anywhere as they're nearly indestructible! In time their tread will wear down, and you could continue to use them, but because their not costly, I just replace them. I wear mine nearly daily, and they last well for 2 years+.

With only whole sizes, many people will have a pair that's a little large or small. Their sizing info was accurate, so as expected, my pair are just a bit large. Perfect in this cool weather with some thick, comfy socks.
So I know crocs aren’t the cutest of shoes, but they’re so comfy! I got these to wear only in the infant room I teach in. My feet don’t hurt at the end of the day!!
Fits nicely. Highly recommend.
You can do anything in crocs, go anywhere in crocs.
Ware them a lot just what I needed for around the house and outside at the gym
Didn't know what size I needed.  Too small
I got my moneys worth out of the last pair I had.  I wore them out after 7+ years.
Got them for friend loved them fit grest
Crocs are super comfortable.  I must have at least 2-3 pairs at any given time!  They are perfect for those who can't wear slippers but be warned, they do seem to run wide.
The color is awesome and meet all expectations.

These new Crocs are not as good as my old ones. I've bought Crocs for years, as gifts too. When mine finally got holes in the soles, I wanted a new pair after so many years. Looked at the new styles, but reviews said the fit was off, so decided to stay with the tried and true. The good old Croc!
Granddaughter wanted these. She is soooo pleased!
Comfortable, great for on the go, and cute!
Ugly but very practical. Keep them at the back door for a quick trip in the garage or in the yard. I wear arches and these work well for quit a while without them.
Fit & color are perfect, & they're so easy to keep clean.

Same as Crocs sold in stores at the mall. Was glad I didn't have to drive 30 miles to get some! Fit is perfect; however, I wear custom-made orthotics, which slide out the back end (as the back isn't high enough to accommodate them); however, have found if I put 2 stapes from a staple gun straight down into the top of the back part of each shoe (side by side horizontally, but lift the staple up 1/16 of an inch after putting them in), this is just enough to hold the orthotics in, and the staples have not fallen out, even after walking or exercising. Would buy again!
These are awesome for when I go camping.  They are easy to slip on and were delivered quickly! I would recommend them for anyone looking for something to slip on and knock around in.
My foot is ten inches long and thus requires size eight according to your instructions.  Yes, the 8 fit well, with good arch support, and the heel strap makes them feel very secure.
Very popular shoe right now.  Granddaughter loves them!

These are being worn by people from 1-101 and I was curious.  Well, I'm not curious anymore; I am delighted.  Crocs are light-weight, comfortable enough to wear around the house or on those extensive window-shopping outings.  They are easy to get on and off (and believe me, with arthritis, that is important).  I wear them with the strap over the top for quick slip-on/off and with the strap down when lots of walking in anticipated. Either way, they are great. And, yes, I will be buying Crocs again.

This is what my 13 year old daughter asked for for her birthday.  She is absolutely in love with them and says they are super comfortable. They are exactly what I expected… Just as hideously ugly as they were when they were popular 10 years ago. Why why why are these back? What's next? Culottes??
Took a walk in them the other day.  They seem comfortable enough to walk around the beach and the hotel in.  Lightweight and impermeable, so they will dry fast!
No complaints. Kind snug over the top of the foot but lessening as breaking in. I'm a big guy and Crocs so far last me a couple years at a time.
Ugly but comfy. Just like I expected! Love them.
My son wears a 11 and these crocs were 11, too big.
They fit great with amble width and room in the toe box. The back strap goes on my heel exactly where needed to keep them on my feet without being too tight.
I wear these around my property and around the house they are very comfortable and easy to slip on and off!!! and they are waterproof!!
first pair of crocs and they fit well, haven't taken them off since I got them, best 11$ ive ever spent
Liked the 2nd order. Had to send 1st order back,was to large.  She used them for her feet I hope. Why did you ask that question?

I wear them all the time. Crocs are the best.

I always buy these for my son. He usually wears these shoes outside as well as inside even out in the yard and on gravel. It is best to avoid gravel but these shoes really take a beating and keep on going. My son says the last pair lasted him about 3 years. I know for sure they last him 2 years. These are the most comfortable light weight shoes to wear if you get the right size. They come only in full sizes, no half sizes. You must remember to not expose these shoes to high heat. You can wash them in your washing machine but do not dry them in the dryer and do not leave them sitting out in the sun light or near something too hot. These shoes should easily last you from 1 to 2 years or longer. They are sturdy except for being exposed to heat. If you don't like the heal strap flip it forward and use them as a slip on shoe. These are wonderful if you have to work in water, like when you are washing your car, etc. The only other caution is to know that hard things like thorns, nails, sharp things can easily penetrate the souls of these shoes. The souls are quite thick but remember it is a foamy material and easy to poke through or cut. These shoes are amazingly comfortable and wear a long time and well worth the money.
I'm new to this wear but i needed a shoe for work that would help my feet breath. This shoe is that shoe. comfy and a walking shoe. I will def. be ordering another pair for my home slippers.
Comfortable, but don’t seem as cushy as some Crocs I’ve had.
Crocs are the best.  What else can I say?
The shoes are too tight if you use the straps.  They run a little small, unlike the ladies Crocs that run true to size. Without the straps they are comfortable like standard Crocs.

This is my first pair of Crocs.  I have plantar fasciitis and it was suggested by a friend that I get crocs to wear in the house.  So, I bought these to use as "in-the-house" shoes with cushy support and they are FANTASTIC!  They have completely relieved by plantar fasciitis in the heel and I'm a happy camper.

I told myself I would never buy this style of Croc, but I figure as a house shoe, I could make an exception.  I have hard wood floors and am super pregnant, so every step was beginning to really hurt.  I've heard good things about these, so I bought the cheapest color in size huge because my feet are in fact, huge.  They fit fine and have definitely eliminated a lot of my foot pain, however, my feet are sitting in a sauna.  I have to wear socks with them and I still have super sweaty (and not to mention, stinky) feet. I'm not one to have ever had a sweaty or stinky foot issue, but in these I'm queen gross foot.  I knew this would be an issue to an extent, but wow, this is ridiculous.  I'll switch between these and my gel flip flops (which don't do much for me) throughout the day, just to give my feet a breather.  Are they comfortable?  Yes.  Would I have bought them if I knew how my feet would handle this material?  Nah.

I bought these to replace a pair I bought 18 years ago. As others have noted, the current "Classic" model is made with a stiffer material than the original...this is absolutely correct. I prefer the softer original, but I'm pretty sure the copycats don't make the soft ones anymore, either. These are also slightly narrower, and the raised rubber nubs feel pointier (maybe because of the stiffer rubber?). Otherwise, these are almost identical to the 18 year old model. I usually like to buy products from the innovator, even if they're more expensive than the copycats, so I may buy these again in the future. On the other hand, the most desirable features have been pretty much designed out of the product, so, when it comes time to replace these, I may go with an entirely different product.

The shoes are plastic, so they can get a little hot when worn for a long time. The shoes have been great to wear indoors around the house. I would not want to walk any distance in them, however. Made in Viet Nam.

These are my garden shoes and very comfortable. I definitely would not run or exercise in them - but perfect for spending the day in my yard. These fit different than my old pair - much bigger and wider but still comfortable.
I wear a US men 9 in adidas and nike and vans, but a size 6 US MEN fits me in these lmao how, the size 8 us men is huge
As a server, these are god-sent. My shifts are much enjoyable with them on. I don't wear anything else anymore.

These crocs were purchased for the pts we treat.  Physical therapy.  Our pt's seem to love the product and have no complaints. You either love or hate this product and my pts seem to love the product.
Legitimate crocs!
Great product

I think Crocs have lowered their quality.  I think the older ones were stronger.  I thought it was because I was buying them online but when I went to the Croc store I noticed that the classics had the same lower quality.  It's a shame because they did get more expensive but it is what it is.
Nice for price
Great shoes
I love crocs. I use them in place of lace-up shoes when I'm home. Little pricey but worth it.
These were perfect!  I received them pretty quickly and DH was so happy to get them.  The sizing was perfect.  He's worn them everyday since they were delivered.
These Crocs are perfect for comfortable wearing all day. My Cerulean Blue pair is exactly the same color as in the picture. The sizing is just right.

love these Crocs. I recommend them and will buy them again.

Package came before noon on day scheduled.  Loved the price, love the clog. Unisex sizes ares smaller than men's sizes. I had a men's 10, bought a unisex 10, and had to return them for a unisex 11.
This product is very good and if I'm glad that I was able to find a pair of Crocs in my size and I hope they were free stock soon so I can buy more and different colors thank you !!!

So...my son is a BIG boy ! Size 15 wide. He wanted a pair of crocs to wear when doing yard work, etc. I got him a size 16...they are a perfect fit and he loves, loves, loves them. They have been on his feet for three days (except when he leaves the property)....he says "Way to metro to wear out in the world." Great price....great product....great fit and no maintenance except hosing them down.

I'm glad I read a few reviews before purchasing these.  I normally wear size 8 1/2 and would have ordered a 9, but a couple of people wrote in their reviews that it is better to go down a half size.  Glad I did.  These size 8's fit perfectly as long as I leave the strap up on the front instead of behind my heal.  They are quite wide, but that too was expected.
Good as expected
These are way too large and wide for my feet.

I got my last pair in white, size 11M 13W.  I normally wear a size 11.5 4E in New Balance.  I can wear a size 11 with or without socks.  (I wear socks to get cardio on my treadmill.) My last pair was made in Mexico.  (Some reviewers have commented that the place of production makes a difference so I included that little tidbit for my fellow Amazon shoppers.)  All in all a very good deal.

I needed an all-purpose gardening shoe and ordered Crocs.  I haven't had any since their inception and had forgotten how comfortable they are.  They have become my shoe of choice to wear inside as well as out for working around the house.  I must, however, endure the comments about how nerdy they are from my children.  Now I'm buying a pair for my husband, so that he can be nerdy with me.
Love my new crocs  They fit great and were a great price. I wear them a lot. Wear them whenever I go to the pool and other casual locations.

Comfortable, my husband does get tired of having them on. So that is a good sign.

Great fit. Feels like I'm walking on air. I love them!

I usually wear a US 9 1/2, so bought a 9 here. Too large, but maybe that's intentional for air circulation. I don't care for the bumpy inside soles. Not much arch support. Prefer the knock-offs I got in the drug store a couple years ago for half the price.

I used to buy 3 or 4 pairs of these shoes every year. I really liked them, but this new pair is terrible. They don’t fit well and are too soft. It looks like they changed to making them in Vietnam, probably to save a few cents.  I will not buy them anymore.

I live in Crocs!  I have several of this same style.  This order I feel Croc changed the recipe.  The heal strap is too tight making the shoe feel too small.  Wish I knew if this one pair is a lemon or if I should reorder same size?

I bought these Crocs for Dad who is 84 years old and only wore his heavy dress shoes.  I bought him these Crocs, he tried them and never took them off.  He was never convinced it was proper to wear them outside of the house but he just loved to relax in them.  He liked that they had good grip since he was walking on wooden floors.  Whole family loves Crocs!

I ordered a 11W/9M in size and gave this as a gift. Unfortunatley, the crocs were in a bag and I didn't take them out to make sure the size was correct, because I assumed I had been sent what I ordered. I was called a day later by the recipient and told that the size was wrong (I had been shipped was a 12W/10M, which was WAY too big!)  It is clearly marked on the bottom of the shoe, and I am so disappointed in Amazon for shipping me the wrong size.  The recipient had really needed these shoes, and rather than mess with a return, I had to go to a store to buy them, which put me out double the cost.  Don't order these online through Amazon--you don't know what size you'll get.

never liked to look but bought a pair of cheapo knockoffs and wear them around the house, they walk great but the knockoff plastic in the upper is a little stiff so ordered the real deal  based on reviews.  Cost 5 times more money in the local store, about 35% less on AMZ.  The knockoffs are a US Mens 10 so ordered mens 10.  Well, they were so large they would not stay on.  Plastic is much more supple so I was sold on going with the Crocs.  Went to local store and tried mens 9 which felt fine so sent 10s back and ordered  a 9 but they are very small. Fit more like an 8 shoe.  They are so small my toes dig into the front.  So sending those back.  Great for walking and comfortable but even though they are obviously molded in one piece there must be differences from machine to machine, plant to plant or something.  I read that these will shrink in sunlight perhaps the 9s were sitting around a while an shrank?  Very disappointed and now another return back to Amazon.  Seems I'll have to go local to find a pair to fit.

Crocs don't run big anymore. I wear a size 10-10 1/2 woman shoe/sneaker and a size 8 men's croc would fit great about 6 years ago( all my old crocs are this size), but now i buy a SIZE 10MENS CROC. This size is perfect with just the right amount of extra room I like.

Crocs don't run big anymore. I wear a size 10-10 1/2 woman shoe/sneaker and a size 8 men's croc would fit great about 6 years ago( all my old crocs are this size), but now i buy a SIZE 10MENS CROC. This size is perfect with just the right amount of extra room I like.

I've never owned a pair of Crocs before and did a lot of research before ordering my first pair.  I wear a size 7.5 in women's and from all the research I did, everything seemed to say go up since these don't come in half sizes, so I ordered a size 8 in lilac.  I liked the look of them when they arrived and they seem well made and lightweight.

They fit well enough for slogging out to the garden, and later I will wear them with socks after the weather cools.  Not as thick soled and comfy as my older pair, and the bumpy ridges are OK but not my favorite foot contact surface.  Certainly cheap enough and no hassle ordering.

I love these shoes, I use them as easy shoes for when I need to run outside quickly. I also use them for boating, walking in the streams and rivers in the Pecos mountains!. If they get muddy, they're really easy to hose off.

I was hesitant to purchase this type of shoes because I rather ware leather shoes. However I needed a pair of comfortable shoes that could get wet without getting damage, so I decided to give it a shoot. I opened the bag and the shoes did not have a plastic smell (that was good) I inspected the shoes and I founded them very light. The violet pearly color is very nice (more of what I expected). I wore the shoes without socks. I noticed that the bottom of the shoes had some texture which gave me a very nice massage while walking. A couple of hours later I realized that I should ware them with socks next time because my feet were getting all sweaty. The next day I used them with thin socks and went to a picnic. I was so amazed how comfortable the shoes were. I am the type of person that will not buy a pair of shoes if they are not comfortable. Now I do understand why so many people use this type of shoes. Oh I forgot to mentioned.. I received complements on my shoes (this...I did not expect it at all). Overall, I am very happy with my purple crocs! If you are looking for a comfy pair of shoes, your search has ended.
Great product for a great price.

i wear size 14 boots with a little wiggle room in the toes but im always a extra wide foot so thats what screwed me. size 14 croc had just enough toe space but very tight around my feet. i think its safe to say i needed size 16 in these.  but ordering a 16 seemed insane at the time. after i returned the size 14 i got for $15 i went to order the size 16 but they jumped from $20 to $35 and still holding at that price. i was sick of flip flops breaking and excited to try cocs but im not happy with the sizing or price hikes. i hope to own the 16 someday but even if they fit better it was a lot of plastic-on-skin contact and feet got very hot and dirty. i see why people wear socks with these. i live in FL so foot wear that is not hot is important. all in all im just not impressed and wished they would of fit the first time. i would of gave them 3 stars probably if they fit. i dont see this product being worth 5 stars or worth over $20 no matter the fit.

When I deployed to Iraq back in 2008, I bought these to use as shower shoes.  They worked very well offering a decent grip on the shower floor.  I used them for an entire year while I was deployed and they held up great.  Not just in the shower trailers, but also when  walking on the desert ground that was super hot.  After using them in Iraq, I decided to just throw them out as I wasn't about to bring them home after using everyday in public showers.  Upon my return I bought another pair that I wear to go outside or down in my basement.  I give 4 stars only because the sizing is a little off.  I am a 9.5 so I ordered size 9 which was too small.  I returned that pair, with ease might I add thanks to Amazon free return, and ordered a size 10.  The size 10 is slightly too big but not to the point where it's annoyingly coming off my foot.  The back strap does the job in keeping them on my feet.

We both got black, so it is always a little dusty on the outside (makes it look like dark grey), and when we wear around the yard or around town, we often get dust, pebbles, and grass in our shoes.  I suppose if you wore them where there was zero debris on the ground, they'd be the perfect shoes!  They are also easy to clean, however - just damp paper towel or cloth wipes it clean. Newbies: Wearing Crocs is not like wearing shoes. They weigh next to nothing and are cushiony without feeling spongy. Your feet don't have to 'grab' them to stay on: you walk effortlessly, even with the backstrap worn forward over your arch, like clogs. They are waterproof, so the shoes are great for gardening, and the ventilation holes will help your feet breathe; you don't have to wear socks, but I do to avoid any hint of sweaty feet. That's not a real problem for me, but feet vary.  After a short period of wearing them, they become even less noticeable as they conform to your feet. Two days later, most of you won't remember any problems, if you had them. Note: They will wear out eventually, especially if you wear them frequently on concrete. Replace them when the soles wear down, before they become dangerously slippery.

I have owned a pair of crocs for about 8 years and wanted a new style so I bought these. The old ones was made in China and the rubber is a lot different than the new crocs that are made now in Mexico. If you leave these crocs in the sun they will shrink a size down. My old crocs I store them on my back porch and they get full sun and have never shrunk. I left these new ones from Mexico in the sun for only a few hours and they are at lease 1/2 size smaller now. My big toe hits the end now as before it didn't. My husband bought a new pair last year and told me they are a lot different than our old pairs and he swore they shrunk when he left them outside but I didn't listen and when I got my new pair it did the same thing. The rubber on the Mexico one's is like a shiny rubber as the old one's from China is a dull rubber. The China ones seems a little thicker also. I don't know why the company started using Mexico to make them but I wished they would go back to China because the old ones are a lot better. I went to a store that sells them and checked them all and they are all made in Mexico. I think the old ones are more comfortable also.
I love these shoes.  They are a different fit from the original ones and I think I will get the next size up when I order them again, but they fit fine and I love them!!!!

I didn't mind them being a little big as I just used them in the garden and yard. I liked that I could easily hose them off and they were surprisingly comfortable. However after leaving them outside they shrunk! I can't even fit my foot in them anymore, my heel hangs off the back. I'm very disappointed with this

I really like my clogs. I just don't like the way they look. And I wouldn't have considered them but I had to travel very light at some point and was jealous of a friend's clogs that served her well. I only wear them at home because I think they are really ugly but at home I wear them all the time. The are great for the garden because you can just hose them off if they get muddy. They are great for inside because they don't slip and the material warms up fast in the winter to keep my feet warm. The are treated with something antibacterial so they don't start to smell in the summer when your feet are sweaty. And they are made in Mexico which I prefer over made in China, for some reason including the short way to transport them. I like the strap in the back too. It is good if you have to walk further with them (which I usually don't but it is good to have options).
